channel.title: Get TV and Video products from bestbuy.ca
channel.description: Get TV and Video products at bestbuy.ca

item.title: Recoton 2-Way Splitter (V304)
item.description: The Recoton V304 2-Way splittler can split an input signal into two separate outputs, such as an antenna source into two TVs or VCRs.

item.title: Recoton "F" Jack To "F" Jack Adapter (V404)
item.description: Extend the length of any two 75 ohm cables without a mechanical splice, using a Recoton V404 "F" Jack to "F" Jack Adapter.

item.title: Recoton 4-Way Splitter (V305)
item.description: Use the Recoton V305 to split an input signal such as an antenna source or RF output into four different outputs. Includes a 75 ohm terminator.

item.title: Recoton A/B Switch (V307)
item.description: The Recoton V307 A/B Switch comes with connectors, two 75 ohm inputs and one output. So, now you can connect two video sources to a single video destination.

item.title: Recoton 3-Way Splitter (V316)
item.description: The Recoton V316 3-Way Splitter splits an input signal into three outputs. It connects an antenna source or RF output to multiple TVs or VCRs.

item.title: Monster Home Theatre 8-Outlet 8' Surge Protector (MP HT800HP)
item.description: HT 800 has all of the great features of the HTS 800 with the exception of phone plug protection. HT 800 has a Monster Clean Power Stage 1 filter for noise free power for sensitive electronic components and protection from surge impulses.
item.FS:LongDescription: Features: • Monster Clean Power Stage 1 v2.0 filter to provide noise free power to your sensitive electronic components. • Color-coded, labeled outlets and matching cord labels for easy hookup. • 8 ft. Monster AC power cable with FlatProfile right angle plug provides flexibility for installations. • 8 outlets total, including 3 spaced for use with AC adapter transformers. • Maximum conductivity 24k gold contact, grounded right angle plug lets furniture hug walls. • Audible and visual indicators for damage, protection, and ground status monitoring. • Protects cable TV coax lines from surge pulses. • Protects coax and phone lines used with DSS equipment from surge pulses. • Includes 1 Monster Video and 1 Monster Internet Cable for fast and easy satellite connections. • $50,000 connected equipment protection and lifetime PowerCenter product warranty. • 1665 Joule rating provides higher level of surge absorption.

item.title: Bose UFS-20 Speaker Floor Stands - Black
item.description: Elegantly display your Bose cube speakers on these modern, sculpted stands that are designed to optimize listening. They position your speakers at just the right height, and cleverly hide unsightly speaker wires from view, too.
item.FS:LongDescription:
FEATURES:
  • For use with Bose Cube Speakers and all Bose Lifestyle systems (except Lifestyle 901).
  • 38" high, to position speakers at the ideal listening position.
  • Black finish
  • Slender black metal stands hide speaker wires.

item.title: Bose UB-20 Cube Speaker Wall/Ceiling Bracket - Black
item.description: Bose's Cube Speakers are black, high-quality cast zinc brackets designed to provide unobtrusive wall mounting for Bose cube speakers.
item.FS:LongDescription:
FEATURES:
  • Compatible with all Bose cube speakers.
  • Allows both horizontal and vertical adjustment.

item.title: Recoton 310 6' Gold-Plated Stereo Audio Video Cable (TSVG)
item.description: The Recoton TSVG 310 is a 6 foot dubbing cable which improves video tape quality when recording from VCR to another, or for viewing on a TV. Gold-plated for maximum signal transfer and lower signal loss than conventional connectors, it also utilises a copper center conductor and RF braid shield to deliver you the clearest and brightest interference-free picture possible.

item.title: Recoton 12' (3.6M) Gold-Plated Composite AV Cables (TSVG312)
item.description: The Recoton TSVG312 12' includes 3 RCA to 3 RCA plugs. For use with DVD, satellite receiver, WebTV, HDTV, VCR, Video Games, and Home Theater Receivers.

item.title: Recoton 4-Way Signal Amplifier (V312)
item.description: Improve picture quality and restore signal loss with the Recoton 4-Way Signal Amplifier.
item.FS:LongDescription:
FEATURES:
  • 4 Way Signal Amplifier TV-VCR 10dB
  • 50 MHz To 450 MHz
  • 115 Volts AC with one 75 Ohm input and four outputs.

item.title: Maxell 3-Pack Videotapes (T-120)
item.description: Capture all your precious moments with high quality, outstanding picture on the Maxell T-120 videotapes. Perfect for full-feature stereo VCRs and recording from full-size camcorders.

item.title: Monster Audio Video 6-Outlet 8' Surge Protector (MP AV600 FR)
item.description: Audio Video PowerProtect AV 600 is for hookup of electronic components to AC Power. AVS 600 features 6 outlets and a slim design for easy placement in tight areas. The 555 Joule rating provides a high level of protection from surge absorption so your system isn't damaged.
item.FS:LongDescription:
• 6 Colour-coded, labeled outlets and matching cord labels for easy hookup.
  • 8 ft. Monster AC power cable with FlatProfile right angle plug provides flexibility for installations.
  • Slim design for easy placement in tight areas.
  • Maximum conductivity 24K gold contact, grounded right angle plug lets furniture hug walls.
  • $10,000 Monster guaranteed connected equipment protection and a 5 year product warranty.

item.title: Monster Home Theatre 2-Outlet Clean Subwoofer Power Center (MP SW200)
item.description: Manage the power of your subwoofer with the Monster SW200. With a noise filtration system that improves subwoofer performance and an RCA input and output to protect connected equipment from improper voltage, the Monster SW200 is sure to improve the sound quality and life of your subwoofer.
item.FS:LongDescription:
FEATURES:
  • Maximum 1110 joule surge protection for both subwoofer signal lines and AC power outlets.
  • Compact, cordless construction plugs directly into wall outlet.
  • 24k gold contact grounded plug for maximum conductivity.
  • Audible alarm lets you know if PowerCenter has sacrificed its life to save your equipment.
  • $50,000 Connected Equipment Warranty.
  • Monster Clean Power stage 1 v2.0 AC noise filtering for improved subwoofer performance.

item.title: Bose UB-20 Cube Speaker Wall/Ceiling Bracket - White
item.description: Bose's Cube Speakers are white, high-quality cast zinc brackets designed to provide unobtrusive wall mounting for Bose cube speakers.
item.FS:LongDescription:
FEATURES:
  • Compatible with all Bose cube speakers.
  • Allows both horizontal and vertical adjustment.

item.title: Dynex Radio Frequency (RF) Modulator (WS-007)
item.description: For TVs without AV jacks, this RF modulator helps adapt older TVs to VCRs, DVD players, camcorders and more. Features an S-video input.

item.title: Monster 3.2' (1M) Ultra Series Component Video Cable (ULTV1000CV)
item.description: This video cable provides the highest quality connection to DVD, HDTV and other component video devices. THX Ultra 1000 Component Video Cables use three cables to send colour and luminance signals for the sharpest, clearest, best possible picture.
item.FS:LongDescription:
FEATURES:
  • High-density double shielding for maximum rejection of RFI and EMI.
  • 24k gold contacts for optimum signal transfer and corrosion resistance.
  • Convenient cable organizer keeps cables tangle-free.
  • Exceeds THX certification standards for proper system performance, reliability and ease of installation.
  • Easy-to-identify colour-coded bands for simple, error-free hook-up.
  • Silver plated conductors for maximum signal transfer.

item.title: Monster 6.6' (2M) Ultra Series Component Video Cable (ULTV1000CV8)
item.description: This video cable provides the highest quality connection to DVD, HDTV and other component video devices. THX Ultra 1000 Component Video Cables use three cables to send colour and luminance signals for the sharpest, clearest, best possible picture.
item.FS:LongDescription:
Uses three cables to send color and luminance signals for the sharpest, clearest, best possible picture. FEATURES:
  • Easy-To-ID Colour-Coded Bands For Simple, Error-Free Hookup
  • High Density Double Shielding For Maximum Rejection Of RF And EM Interference
  • Heavy-Duty Metal Shell Connector For A More Durable Connection That Won't Vibrate Loose
  • 24k Gold Contacts For Optimum Signal Transfer And Corrosion Resistance
  • Exceeds THX Certification Standards For Proper System Performance, Reliability And Ease Of Installation
  • Silver Plated Conductors For Maximum Signal Transfer
  • Convenient Cable Organizer Keeps Cables Tangle-Free

item.title: Monster Cable 8' Video Cable (THXV100CV-8)
item.description: Today's home theatre systems require high quality cables to ensure that quality of sound and picture is as high as possible. With easy to identify colour-coded bands for simple, error-free hookup, the Monster THXV100CV-8 is an 8 foot component video cable that packs a punch and will give you the performance you were meant to see and hear.
item.FS:LongDescription:
FEATURES:
  • High quality 24k gold contacts for optimum signal transfer and corrosion resistance.
  • Increased power handling of speaker cables to deliver the full dynamic range of explosions and crashes found in today's movies.
  • High-density double shielding for maximum rejection of RFI and EMI.
  • Meets minimum THX certification standards for proper system performance, reliability and ease of installation.
  • Uses three cables to send colour signal separately for improved picture.
  • Stylish, futuristic connector design was inspired by Lucas Film's Star Wars movies.

item.title: Monster Home Theatre 7-Outlet 8' Surge Protector (MP HTIB650 CAN)
item.description: Protect your valuable home theatre equipment with Monster's advanced MP HTIB 650 Power Protect Surge Protector. It features high capacity surge protection in an easy to use form factor. All of the outlets are labelled and colour coded and come with 24k gold contact connections.
item.FS:LongDescription:
FEATURES:
  • Monster Power provides higher capacity surge protection.
  • The colour-coded outlets and matching AC cord labels make cable hook-up and organization easy.
  • The ultra-wide spacing accommodates power adapters.
  • Protection ON And Ground OK Indicators
  • 30 Degree Angled Plug Design
  • Dual Mode Plus AC over-voltage auto disconnect safety feature.
  • $50,000 Connected Equipment Warranty

item.title: Monster Cable EU Component Video Cable (MV2CV-2M)
item.description: Monster MV2CV-2M EU Component Video Cable is a high performance component video cable for hook-up of a DVD player to TV monitor, projector, digital TV or line doubler using component video inputs/outputs. MV2CV's multi-stranded, all-copper construction provides the clearest, sharpest picture possible.

item.title: Monster Cable TV Cleaning Kit
item.description: For the clearest, sharpest big screen picture possible, keep your television clean with Monster's dripless solution. Streak-free, it removes dust, dirt, and oily fingerprints without staining like ordinary cleaners.
item.FS:LongDescription:
FEATURES:
  • Advanced formula cleans without dripping, streaking or staining like ordinary cleaners.
  • Includes 1 high-tech reusable MicroFiber cloth that cleans screens without scratching.

item.title: Shaw High-Definition Cable Box (6200 HD) - Western Canada and MB Only
item.description: The Shaw DCT6200HD High-Definition Cable Box for all models of HDTV's, delivers both HD programming and interactive digital cable. It will also let you watch regular shows from networks that are not yet broadcasting in High-Definition. Please Note: This product is available in AB, BC and MB only.
item.FS:LongDescription:
• Combined with your HD-Ready TV, you can watch and hear HD broadcasts like you are supposed to, in High-Definition, AC3 and Dolby Digital.
  • It's simple and easy to hook-up, with world-class 24/7 customer service and support from Shaw.
  • Built-in DOCSIS cable modem, designed to take advantage of future interactive services - such as t-commerce - when they become available.

ATT.ATT_NAME: Record One Show While Watching Another

item.title: Recoton Infrared (IR) Remote Control Extender (DSC-IR100A)
item.description: Add an additional 100' to the range of your remote using the Recoton Extender. This system extends the range of any IR remote, even through walls, ceilings and floors.
item.FS:LongDescription:
FEATURES:
  • Converts any IR remote control to a through-wall remote.
  • Operates your home theatre system from up to 100' away
  • Controls satellite receivers, VCRs, CD/DVD players, receivers and cable boxes.
  • Operating range for transmitter is 100', and receiver is 20'.

item.title: Recoton Push On "F" Plug Adapter
item.description: Quick Connect "F" plug adapter, converts screw type "F" plug to quick connect "F" connector, gold plated.

item.title: Energizer Portable DVD Battery (ER-DVD)
item.description: Add extra power to your portable DVD player by using this universal battery. It doesn't replace the battery in the player, but attaches easily to add 120-360 minutes of extra viewing time.
item.FS:LongDescription:
FEATURES:
  • Fits most portable DVD models.
  • Lightweight and compact size.
  • Provides up to 6 hours of extra viewing time, depending on model and usage.
  • Unique cord management feature.

item.title: Dynex Dynex 6' Extension Power Cord with 3 Grounded Outlets
item.description: Give yourself over 6' of flexibility in placing your components and other electronic devices with this dependable power cord. It features 3 grounded outlets and a 3 prong extension cord. *Please Note: Power Cord For Indoor Use Only.

item.title: Bose UB-20 Cube Speaker Wall/Ceiling Bracket - Silver
item.description: The Bose UB-20 Speaker Bracket provides versatile and stylish mounting options for your Bose speakers. These are high-quality cast zinc brackets and can be used inside or outdoors. Designed to provide unobtrusive wall mounting for Bose cube speakers, these brackets will add style and functionality to your speakers. *Please Note: Image Shows Bracket In Use (Black Model). Speakers Sold Separately.
item.FS:LongDescription: • The bracket allows both horizontal and vertical adjustment of speakers, so you can direct the sound where you like.

item.title: Sanus 30" - 52" Full-Motion Flat-Panel TV Wall Mount (VMSAS-01) - Silver
item.description: The Sanus VisionMounts VMSA is designed for large displays (30" - 52") and allows variable positioning by use of its swing arm. No tools required to adjust. It holds up a plasma TV up to 68.25 kg.
item.FS:LongDescription:
FEATURES:
  • Product Dimensions: 89(W) x 26(H) x 6(D) cm
  • Product Weight: 13 kg

item.title: Rogers 160GB HD-PVR Cable Box (8300 HDPVR) - Ontario Only
item.description: Explore a whole new world of entertainment with the Rogers 8300HD PVR Digital Cable Box. This box is an HDTV Digital Cable terminal and digital recorder all in one. It allows you, through your remote, to easily record one program while watching a different channel, pause, rewind, play "live TV" and many more! Please Note: This product is available in Greater Toronto Area only.
item.FS:LongDescription:
• Instant Replay
  • Record two shows at once (while also able to watch a pre-recorded show).
  • Picture-In-Picture
  • Record up to 20 hours of HD or up 90 hour of SD programming (or a combination of both).
  • Dolby Digital 5.1 for available programming and wide-screen images with proportions of 16:9.
  • You can also zoom or stretch images and choose the output.
  • You also have both Component (Y,Pb,Pr) and HDMI.
  • HDTV connections (HDMI supports DVI down conversion) and a Serial ATA external hard-drive capability.
  • 160GB Hard-Drive
  • Instant Replay of last 8 seconds
  • Advanced MPEG-2 Compliant
  • Page-At-A-Time Scrolling in Guide
  • 1 Set Of RCA-Type A/V and Output Jacks
  • S-Video Output Jack
  • Software Upgrades
  • Title and Artist Display
  • 40 Digital Music Channels
  • Parental Control
  • Time-Shifting
  • Interactive Program Guide

item.description: Enjoy high definition cable TV with the Cogeco DCT6412 Digital Cable Box. Never miss another show with Cogeco's high definition 1080i/720p decoder and personal video recorder. Features include Pause Live TV, AC Dolby Digital, optical and component outputs, 120GB hard drive and much more. The DCT 6412 will allow you to watch one channel and record another. item.title: Monster 6.5' (2M) HDMI-DVI Cable (HDMI400/DVI)
item.description: Monster's High Definition Multimedia Interface 400 is a high-bandwidth digital connection that offers superior digital video and multi-channel audio in a single cable, reducing the maze of home theater connections. Its' simple, user-friendly connection is backwards-compatible with DVI, and delivers a high-definition picture that's five times the resolution of conventional TVs.
item.FS:LongDescription:
You've invested in HDMI technology so you could get superior picture and sound from your home theater. Now you can maximize the performance of this extraordinary digital interface by making the connection with the highest quality cable.

FEATURES:
  • Monster HDMI 400's advanced design and construction exceeds HDMI standards to transfer digital AV signals with optimal power, accuracy and clarity.
  • 24k Gold contacts resist corrosion to provide optimum signal transfer.
  • Triple-layer shielding rejects interference for the clearest picture possible.
  • Monster's gas-injected cellular dielectric helps facilitate high velocity transfer and maximum signal strength, even over long lengths.

item.title: Monster Audio Video 8-Outlet 8' Surge Protector (MP AV800)
item.description: AV 800 is for hookup of electric components to AC Power providing surge protection for components and DSS or cable TV coax cable. It features eight outlets and inputs for 1 pair of coax cables. A 1480 joule rating provides a high level of surge absorption.
item.FS:LongDescription:
FEATURES:
  • Colour-coded, labeled outlets and matching cord labels for easy hookup.
  • 8' Monster AC power cable with FlatProfile right angle plug provides flexibility for installations.
  • 8 Outlets total, including 3 spaced for use with AC adapter transformers.
  • Maximum conductivity 24k gold contact, grounded right angle plug lets furniture hug walls.
  • Audible and visual indicators for damage, protection, and ground status monitoring.

item.title: Monster Home Theatre 8-Outlet 8' Clean Power Center (MP HTS800HP)
item.description: HTS 800 offers both Clean Power and surge protection for AC power lines. Clean Power Stage 1 filter provides noise-free power to you sensitive electronic components. HTS 800 also features coax cable protection and plugs phone lines for protection when used with DSS equipment. 8 color-coded labeled outlets and matching cord labels make for easy hookup.
item.FS:LongDescription:
FEATURES:
  • Monster Clean Power Stage 1 v2.0 filter to provide noise free power to your sensitive electronic components.
  • 8 ft. Monster AC power cable with FlatProfile right angle plug provides flexibility for installations.
  • 8 Outlets total, including 3 spaced for use with AC adapter transformers.
  • Audible and visual indicators for damage, protection, and ground status monitoring.
  • Maximum conductivity 24k gold contact, grounded right angle plug lets furniture hug walls.
  • Includes 1 Monster Video and 1 Monster Internet Cable for fast and easy satellite connections.
  • $50,000 connected equipment protection and lifetime PowerCenter product warranty.
  • Protects cable TV coax lines from surge pulses.
  • 1665 Joule rating provides higher level of surge absorption.

item.title: Dynex S-Video Switcher (DX-VS201)
item.description: This Dynex DX-VS201 S-Video Switcher features a 4 Input (2 with S-Video) & 2 Output (with S-video) Audio/Video Switcher. With front panel input design, instant one-touch push bottom switch and this switcher is so easy to use.

item.title: Videotron Standard Definition Digital Cable Box (SD) - QC Only
item.description: Digital TV like you've never seen it! Just easily plug and play the Illico Basic Digital Cable... no dish is required! Please Note: This product is available in Quebec only.
item.FS:LongDescription:
• Plug Up To 9 Other Tvs On The Analog Cable (With 1 Telemax Package, Sold Separately)
  • DVD Quality Image & Sound
  • S-Video Output & Dolby 5.1 Sound
  • Ready For Video On Demand (Virtual Videoclub)
  • Largest Number Of Pay Per View Channels In Quebec (Viewer's Choice: 16 Channels, Indigo: 40 Channels)
  • Galaxie Audiodigital Service (30 Channels)
  • Interactive TV Guide
  • Ready For Other Applications: Emails, Chat & Interactive Features
  • Access up to 265 channels.
  • 100% Digital Quality
  • Easy Self Installation

ATT.ATT_NAME: Record One Show While Watching Another

item.title: Videotron High-Definition Cable Box (HD) - QC Only
item.description: The ILLICO High Definition Terminal Cable Box makes every single detail comes to life! With a HD terminal you can get features such as movie theatre quality, Dolby 5.1 Sound, and a high definition signal that captures shows in 16:9 widescreen. Please Note: This product is available in Quebec only.
item.FS:LongDescription:
• Movie theatre quality image 5 times clearer and more precise than with conventional digital TV.
  • A high definition digital signal that captures shows in 16:9 widescreen format rather than the standard 4:3 ratio.
  • Built-In Receiver That Requires No Additional Equipment
  • Optimal 1080i resolution with a component output that surpasses S-video quality.
  • Product Dimensions: 35(W) x 7(H) x 25(D) cm
  • Weight: 3.6 kg
  • Interactive TV Guide And Applications
  • Dolby Digital 5.1 Sound
  • Get the HD extra package for $5.99 per month.

item.title: Recoton 25' (7.6M) RG6U Coaxial Audio Video Cable (TSDV622C)
item.description: Recoton TSDV622C 25' RG6 Coaxial Cable comes equipped with weatherproof "F" connectors, for use with satellite, antenna and cable signals. It's for both indoor and outdoor use, including burial, which sends both audio and video signals.

item.title: Recoton 25' (7.6M) RG6U Coaxial Audio Video Cable (TSDV622WC) - White
item.description: Recoton's white TSDV622WC 25' RG6 Coaxial Cable comes equipped with weatherproof "F" connectors, for use with satellite, antenna and cable signals. It's for both indoor and outdoor use, including burial, which sends both audio and video signals.

item.title: Recoton 100' (30.4M) RG6U Coaxial Audio Video Cable (TSDV625C)
item.description: Recoton 100' RG6 Coaxial Cable is used with satellite, antenna and cable signals.
item.FS:LongDescription:
• Equipped with weather-proof "F" connector.
  • For Indoor and Outdoor Use

item.title: Shaw Direct Motorola Dual Tuner 160GB HD-PVR Satellite Receiver System (DSR 530)
item.description: The Shaw Direct Motorola (Formerly Star Choice) DSR 530 HD-PVR lets you store up to 25 hours of high definition programming. Pause and rewind live TV, record while watching a different channel and use the convenient interactive features to control everything you watch.
item.FS:LongDescription:
• The 160GB hard drive means you can record up to 120 hours of standard definition, more than 25 hours of HD programming, or a combination of the two. (Hours may vary depending on content.)
  • Pause the action or rewind the live show to relive your favourite moments - Live On Disk recording gives you total control
  • Integrated dual tuners lets you record one live show while watching another live show or watching a recorded program while recording a live show
  • Interactive features include Simple Navigation, Picture-in-Guide browsing capabilities, interest functions so you can plan ahead for shows, enhanced parental controls and more

Power, Channel Up and Channel Down Front Panel Buttons

item.title: Recoton 6' (1.8M) Component Video Cable (DVD361C)
item.description: The Recoton DVD361C 6' Component Video Cable is used to connect video components to a TV. It transmits video signal along three discrete paths for the highest quality video reproduction. It features gold plated connectors, ideal for connecting the latest digital components to your home theatre system.

item.title: Recoton RCA Plug Coupler (V407C)
item.description: Recoton V407C RCA Plug Coupler is used for joining two RCA-type cables together to increase cable length.

item.title: Recoton 6' (1.8M) RG6U Coaxial Audio Video Cable (TSDV620C)
item.description: Recoton TSDV620C 6' RG6 Coaxial Cable comes equipped with weatherproof "F" connectors, for use with satellite, antenna and cable signals. It's for both indoor and outdoor use, including burial which sends both audio and video signals.

item.title: Recoton 6' (1.8M) RG6U Coaxial Audio Video Cable - White (TSDV620WC)
item.description: Recoton 6' RG6 Coaxial Cable comes equipped with weatherproof "F" connectors, for use with satellite, antenna and cable signals. It's for both indoor and outdoor use, including burial, which sends both audio and video signals.

item.title: Recoton Screw-On RG6 "F" Connectors (V201C)
item.description: Recoton V201C RG6 "F" Connectors come 2 per pack and work with no crimping tool required. It is for use with 75-Ohm RG^ coaxial cable.

item.title: Recoton Crimp-On RG6 "F" Connectors (V203C)
item.description: Recoton V203C Crimp On RG6 "F" Connectors are for use with 75-Ohm coaxial cable. They are weatherproof for outdoor use, and terminates whihc allows for custom coaxial cable lengths.

item.title: Recoton 12' (3.6M) RG6U Coaxial Audio Video Cable (TSDV621C)
item.description: Recoton TSDV621C 12' RG6 Coaxial Cable comes equipped with weatherproof "F" connectors, for use with satellite, antenna and cable signals. It's for both indoor and outdoor use, including burial, which sends both audio and video signals.

item.title: Recoton 12' (3.6M) RG6U Coaxial Audio Video Cable (TSDV621WC) - White
item.description: Recoton 12' RG6 Coaxial Cable comes equipped with weatherproof "F" connectors, for use with satellite, antenna and cable signals. They can be used for both indoor and outdoor, and also includes burial, which sends both audio and video signals.

item.title: Sanus BF24B-03 Speaker Stands
item.description: The BF24B-03 speaker stands have a simple, elegant design and will hold your small bookshelf speakers at the proper listening height. It is built using energy-absorbing MDF, not particle board, and has a durable powder-coated black finish. Other features include ABS plastic push-in spikes for stability, a concealed wire path and neoprene speaker isolation pads.

The pivoting and rotating UHF loop adjusts for enhanced picture quality of channels 14 to 69. It also feature recessed variable gain control up to 25dB for improved signal reception.

Plus, it's also MPEG-4 upgradeable, making it ready for future enhancements.

This will maintain the performance levels of your DVD player and ensure quality and consistency of the laser's performance. It is also for use with portable DVD players.

item.title: Memorex Optifix Pro Refill Kit
item.description: The OptiFix Pro Refill Kit will help prolong the life of your OptiFix Pro. It can be used with all OptiFix Pro ET devices. The refill kit includes 1 oz. cleaning solution, 1 ml. repair solution, one set of cleaning pads, and one set of repair pads. This is good for an additional 15 - 20 cleaning cycles and 5 - 10 repair cycles.

item.title: OptiFix CD/DVD Scratch Repair & Cleaning Kit
item.description: Clean and repair CDs, DVDs and video games with the OptiFix CD/DVD Scratch Repair & Cleaning Kit. Also repair scratches on optical surfaces including PDAs, monitors and cameras.

item.title: Energizer Extended-Use DVD Battery
item.description: The ER-DVD-MAX is Energizer's new Super Long Life DVD battery. It is the solution to the problem of limited battery life with portable DVD players. Few things are more frustrating than getting almost through a movie and having your batteries go dead. The ER-DVD is not a replacement battery.
item.FS:LongDescription:
It is an extra, booster battery that adds up to 480 minutes of extra life to your DVD player. It comes with multiple tips to fit most players. With recharger.
The ER-DVD-MAX is Energizer's highest capacity solution to the problem of limited battery life with portable DVD players. Don't face the frustration of getting almost through a movie and having your batteries go dead. Watch multi-disc movies or multiple movies on a long flight.
The ER-DVD-MAX is not a replacement battery. It is an extra, booster battery that adds up to 480 minutes of extra life to your DVD player. It is rated at 4000 MaH and 9.6 volts. It comes with multiple tips to fit most players.
The ER-DVD-MAX comes complete with a charger. It uses a no-memory effect battery, so the battery can be recharged to full power at any time. There is no need to fully drain batteries before charging.
Depending on your model of DVD player, the Energizer ER-DVD-MAX will extend the run time of your player by up to 8 hours.
The ER-DVD-MAX comes with a one year replacement warranty.

item.title: Logitech Harmony 890 Advanced Universal Remote Control (966193-0215)
item.description: Logitech's Harmony 890 remote control uses both radio frequency (RF) and infrared (IR) wireless signals to deliver powerful complete control of your home-entertainment system that may be hidden behind cabinets. With a wireless range of up to 100 feet, the Harmony 890 remote sends RF commands to a wireless receiver, which then blasts infrared signals to the components.
item.FS:LongDescription:
• Control your entire home entertainment system with just one button. Effortlessly switch between watching home theatre and listening to music, by selecting a single activity button.
  • Integrate up to 15 devices - including lighting and household appliances.
  • The online setup makes it easy to update a remote when upgrading your home entertainment system.
  • Save Energy: Each time a new activity is selected, the remote establishes the proper state of all of the components needed for the current activity, and turns off the components that aren't needed.
  • A vibrant color display features 8 on-screen activity buttons make it easy.
  • Attractive charging station for recharge.

Sturdy metal construction and integrated wire control make these speakers a great choice. Height: 24" (61 cm) Width: 15" Depth 4".
item.FS:LongDescription: Get the best audio quality from your speakers with these sturdy silver stands that turn your bookshelf speakers into floor standing speakers, optimizing their performance and expanding your decorating options.

item.title: Bose UTS-20 Speaker Table Stand - Black
item.description: This cast aluminum single stand allows your Bose Acoustimass satellite speaker to be elegantly placed anywhere there's a flat surface. A groove in the tubing conceals the speaker wire while providing quick and easy access. Height: 7" (17.8 cm).

item.title: Rocketfish 4' (1.2M) HDMI to DVI-D Cable (RF-G1112)
item.description: Rocketfish RF-G1112 4' HDMI to DVI-D Cable carries digital video signals for the best signal integrity and performance. 24K gold-plated, precision-crafted HDMI connectors. High-purity, silver-soldered internal connections. For use with digital video equipment with DVI capability; supports high-definition formats.
item.FS:LongDescription: Rocketfish? Rocketfish! Rocketfish A/V cables are a house brand of cables designed through customer research and employee feedback. Using the same high quality materials found in other premium brands Rocketfish is the answer to questions that many of our customers have been asking. Why Rocketfish? Our customers have been looking for an in-house brand that provides better reliability and quality than entry level cables. By using high quality materials and advanced manufacturing processes we can provide that with Rocketfish A/V cables. Several other concerns are also answered by Rocketfish. It Can’t Take Much More Captain! Ever been stuck behind your TV trying to get a cable to fit onto a connector? No matter how much you push on that cable you don’t seem to make any progress - and even worse, it feels like you’re going to break the connector! Enter the Rocketfish A/V cables - a much lower "insertion force" is required to get and keep a solid connection without risk of damaging your electronics. Corral Those Cables! Better still, every single Rocketfish cable comes with the Rocketfish clip - a small three headed cable management adapter designed to keep your cables in line. The clip comes with three cable channels to connect your cables keeping the mess to a minimum and making cabling a snap to organize. No other cables come with a cable management system making Rocketfish a unique and functional choice. Digital Video HDMI/DVI Rocketfish digital video cables are made up of a 95% copper braid with a dual layer 100% aluminum mylar foil shielding to protect the signal from outside interference like RFI (radio frequency interference: cordless phones, routers, radios) and EMI (power lines, microwaves, appliances, heavy machinery) The 24k gold plating on cable-end connectors offers better corrosion resistance and enhanced signal transfer quality - conducting more of the signal to your components with the minimum of signal loss. Inside the cable a multi-stranded, high purity copper conductors maintain signal integrity for true image throughput. The connectors and conductors are connected by silver soldering to maximize conductivity for better signal transfer.

item.title: Rocketfish 4' (1.2M) 4-PIN S-Video Cable (RF-G1113)
item.description: Rocketfish RF-G1113 4' S-Video Cable (4pin) carries video signal on two separate paths for sharper picture. 24K gold-plated, precision-crafted S-video connector. Eliminates video distortion and maximizes signal strength for a better picture. Low-capacitance design for accurate video reproduction.
item.FS:LongDescription: Rocketfish? Rocketfish! Rocketfish A/V cables are a house brand of cables designed through customer research and employee feedback. Inside the cable a 75 Ohm coaxial, nitrogen-injected dielectric cable maximizes signal strength and integrity for true image throughput and protecting the cable from kinks and bends. The connectors and conductors are connected by silver soldering to maximize conductivity for better signal transfer.

item.title: Rocketfish 6' (1.8M) Composite (RCA) Audio Video Cable (RF-G1116)
item.description: 24K Gold-plated interconnects resist corrosion, ensuring a clean signal transfer for years to come. Oxygen-free solid-copper-center conductors provide an easy-to-travel signal path. Multi-shielded design with two 90% copper braids and 100% aluminum Mylar foil. Minimal resistance and exceptional digital audio signal transfer for accurate sound reproduction.

item.description: This product features minimal resistance and exceptional digital audio signal transfer for accurate sound reproduction.
item.FS:LongDescription:
• 24K Gold-plated interconnects resist corrosion, ensuring a clean signal transfer for years to come.
  • Oxygen-free solid-copper-center conductors provide an easy-to-travel signal path.
  • Multi-shielded design with two 90% copper braids and 100% aluminum Mylar foil protects against external signal interference.
  • Silver soldering maximizes conductivity for better signal transferral.
  • You can use RocketClip to organize your cable.
  • Ergonomic, non-slip grip and smooth-fit insertion force minimizes risk of damage to your connectors and devices.

item.title: Monster HDMI 4M Cable (HDMI300-4M EU)
item.description: Monster HDMI300 cables are designed for high definition video or standard video formats, supporting multiple video formats from stereo to multi-channel sounds. The HDMI300 is gas injected dielectric for optimum signal strength and ultra-low loss. The high density triple-shielding provides maximum rejection of RFI and EMI.

item.title: Monster LCD 2-Outlet Surge Protector (FS MP AVFL200 CAN)
item.description: The Monster Cable LCD Power Protect provides AC power protection and coaxial protection for flat screen, plasma and LCD TVs. It features two AC outlets for surge protection and one pair coaxial connections for cable TV/satellite, TV/HDTV surge protection. It has dual mode plus power protection circuitry with 1260 joule rating and audible alarm.
item.FS:LongDescription:
• 1110 Joule rating provides high level protection of surge absorption.
  • Navajo white and compact design to easily blend in with any home's décor.
  • 24k gold contact plug for maximum corrosion resistance and power transfer.
  • $50,000 connected equipment warranty.
  • French Compliant

item.title: Rogers HDTV Digital Cable Terminal Starter Kit (HIGH DEFINITION KIT) - ON Only
item.description: Rogers HDTV Starter Kit for only $19.99 - Everyone is different - with different tastes, different schedules, different expectations. Personal TV is the only service that allows you to truly watch what you want, when you want. Experience true high-definition TV (HDTV) with personal TV in 100% digital and save!
item.FS:LongDescription: Once you've purchased an HDTV or HD-ready television, you then have two different Digital Terminals to choose from: our High-Definition TV (HDTV) Digital Terminal or the revolutionary, all-in-one High-Definition Personal Video Recorder (HD PVR). The choice is yours. With a Rogers HDTV Digital Terminal, enjoy the full experience that your High-Definition TV has to offer and save big with this special Starter Kit. FREE rental (number of months free varies on the promotional offer) of the HDTV Digital Terminal (including local HDTV channels and Rogers Sportsnet HD) and HDTV Specialty Programming, which includes time shifted U.S. HDTV Network channels. Go one step further with a Rogers HD PVR - everything HDTV has to offer with the benefits of digitally recording what you want to see, when you want to see it. Digitally record up to 20 hours of High-Definition programming or 90 hours of Standard-Definition programming and play it back whenever you want. Record two programs at the same time or view two shows simultaneously with picture-in-picture. Even pause and rewind not only recorded programs, but live TV too! You can't get this on satellite! FREE rental (number of months free varies on the promotional offer) of the HD PVR (including local HDTV channels and Rogers Sportsnet HD) and HDTV Specialty Programming, which includes time shifted U.S. HDTV Network channels - and never miss a show again! One Free Viewers Choice Pay Per View Or Rogers On Demand Regular Movie ($5.99 VALUE) - NOTE: TV purchase is required to be eligible for these offers. Not available in all areas. Basic Cable required. Must subscribe to Standard-Definition TSN and Discovery Channel in order to qualify for HD Specialty Channel Package. Rogers Digital Cable works on your existing TV. Not all services (including Rogers On Demand) and channels are available in all areas. Cannot be combined with any other Rogers offer. Prices, programming and offer subject to change. Offer not available to existing or previous Rogers Digital Cable customers within past 90 days. Additional restrictions may apply. Applicable taxes extra.

item.title: Monster 6.5' (2M) All-In-One Mini Component A/V Cable (FSV200 CVA-2M)
item.description: The 2 metre Monster All-In-One Mini-Component Video Stereo Cable is a connection for high-definition flat screen hook-up. It is specifically engineered to complement LCD & Plasma displays.
item.FS:LongDescription:
• Delivers true high-definition video (up to 1080p) without cable clutter.
  • Ultra-slim design for easy cable routing in tight spaces.
  • Mini stubby connector for low-profile, no-hassle hook-up.
  • Dual-layer shielding for maximum rejection of interference.
  • The cable is UL CL2 rated for in wall use.

item.title: Monster 6.5' (2M) Flat Screen F-PIN-Mini Video Cable (FS V200 F-2M)
item.description: The 2 metre Monster Flat Screen Cable is specifically engineered to complement flat screen LCD & Plasma displays. It features an ultra-slim design and the patented Stubby connector for easy, no-hassle cable routing through narrow spaces, eliminating unsightly cable clutter. The cable is UL CL2 rated for in wall use.

item.title: Monster 6.5' (2M) Flat Screen HDMI-Mini Cable (FS V200 HDMI-2M)

It has an ultra-slim design and patented Stubby connector for easy, no-hassle cable routing through narrow spaces. The cable is UL CL2 rated for in wall use.

item.title: RCA 4-Device Universal Remote Control (RCR450)
item.description: The RCR450 controls up to four electronic components and makes juggling remote controls a thing of the past. You can program this universal remote to operate most models of most brands of infrared, remote-controlled components manufactured after 1990.

item.title: Insignia 15" LCD/DVD Combo HDTV** (NS-CL15C)
item.description: Perfect for a summer home, recreational vehicle or even just a small room, the Insignia NS-CL15C 15" LCD HDTV offers same remarkable image as other HDTVs in a package that fits almost anywhere. The built-in DVD player saves even more space by eliminating the need for an external one.
item.FS:LongDescription:
Aside from its gorgeous image, space-saving thin design and integrated DVD player, the Insignia NS-CL15C allows for the connection of additional devices such as a cable box, satellite receiver, VCR, or game console. The audio/video stereo function makes all the sound you hear more full and rich, and the DVD player is compatible with many different disc formats such as DVD, VCD, CD and JPEG. Other features include a V-chip, sleep timer and trilingual OSD.
**Requires HDTV Source

item.title: Sanus Satellite Speaker Stand (HTB4B-03)
item.description: The Sanus "Home Theater Foundations" HTB4B-03 is an adjustable stand for satellite - HTiB speakers weighing up to 1.59 kg. Its heavy-gauge angled steel pillar is adjustable from 28" to 38" to put your speakers at the optimum height for the best sound. A smoked black tempered glass base features chrome spiked feet for added stability.

Almost all speakers can be mounted with included: top plates, L-shaped brackets, Dual bolt speaker mount adaptors and Quickmount adaptor for speakers with keyhole s on the back. A concealed wire path hides speaker wires from view for a clean and organized appearance. The stands are finished in a durable powder-coated black finish. FEATURES:
  • The modern look of these stands blend seamlessly into many home theatre settings.
  • Durable powder coated finish in black, smoked black, tempered glass base.

item.title: Sanus 15" - 37" Full-Motion Flat-Panel TV Wall Mount (MF202-B3)
item.description: The Sanus VisionMount MF202 is a full motion mount for small to medium LCD TV's. Sanus' virtual axis 3D Technology allows the mount to Tilt and Swivel with fluid motion in every direction possible. The Low Profile of the mount places the TV just 2" / 5.08 cm from the wall.
item.FS:LongDescription:
Full Motion of the mount allows for superior viewing from multiple angles. The bracket will hold the TV at a specific viewing angle and an adjustment knob enables the user to increase or decrease the tension to hold the TV in a fixed position if necessary. Keyholes on the faceplate slide onto the TV and into place for effortless bracket alignment and easy installation. Virtually every 15" to 37" LCD TV (that uses the VESA mounting system) can be mounted on this bracket. The bracket comes with the VESA 100 x 100 and 75 x 75 mount installed and included is a larger adaptor mount for VESA 200 X 100 or 200 x 200 mounting.
  • Fits flat panel TVs from 15" to 37" up to 60lbs.
  • Colour/Finish: Black
  • Product Dimensions: 23.5(W) x 23.5(H) x 5.08(D) cm
  • Product Warranty: 5 Years
  • Allows multiple direction tilt/swivel.
  • TV is positioned just 2" from wall.
  • Solid heavy guage steel construction (CUL approved).

item.title: Sanus 15" - 37" Full-Motion Flat-Panel TV Wall Mount (MF209-B3)
item.description: The VisionMount MF209 is a full-motion wall mount for small to medium LCD TVs. Sanus Systems' Virtual Axis 3D technology allows mount to tilt, swivel, pan and extend with fluid motion in every direction possible up to 9" from the wall. Full motion allows easy viewing from multiple angles, and adjustment knob enables TV to move easily while maintaining tension for the perfect viewing angle.
item.FS:LongDescription: Keyholes on faceplate slide onto TV and into place for effortless bracket alignment and easy installation. Includes two VESA-compatible TV brackets: large bracket fits 200 x 200, 200 x 100 and 100 x 100; small bracket fits 100 x 100 and 75 x 75 to accommodate virtually any 15" to 37" LCD TV or monitor up to 60 lbs.

item.title: Terk 3-Way HDMI Auto Switcher (CDHDMI31)
item.description: The Terk CHDMI31 3-way HDMI switcher allows you to connect up to 3 HDMI devices to a single HDMI input for premium digital picture & sound. Whether you're limited by the number of HDMI inputs on your TV or surround sound receiver, the CHDMI31 provides an easy & economical solution.

This switching device supports 480i, 480p, 720p, 1080i, & 1080p picture signals, & HDCP compliant devices. For added ease of use, the CHDMI31 is equipped with an automatic switching feature & built-in bracket for wall-mounting if desired. 1 year limited manufacturer's warranty.

item.title: TiVo Dual Tuner Digital Video Recorder (TCD649080) - English Only
item.description: After a long wait, TiVo comes to Canada. Now you can record your favourite shows, movies and sporting events and watch them any time you want to. You can also pause it whenever you want, fast forward through commercials, and even send content to your laptop and other devices with TiVoToGo transfers.
item.FS:LongDescription:
• Record shows from 2 basic cable channels, or 1 basic cable and 1 digital cable channel at once with the built-in dual tuner (does not support recording from 2 digital cable or satellite channels at once).
  • Record and store up to 80 hours of your favourite shows and movies and watch them whenever you want.
  • Multiroom viewing gives you access to TiVo no matter where you are in your home (requires existing home network and additional networking accessories).
  • Control live TV with pause, rewind, instant replay and slow motion functions.
  • Search for your favourite shows by keyword, actor, title or sports team.
  • Send shows to your laptop, PSP or iPod with TiVoToGo transfers.
  • Schedule last-minute recordings from anywhere on the Web.
  • The Season Pass recording option automatically records your favorite shows every time they're on.
*Requires monthly TiVo subscription
Please note: both the packaging and instructions booklet are only available in English, though we expect to receive bilingual packaging in late spring 08. TiVo Customer Support and Activation are only supported in English.

item.title: TiVo Wireless Network Adapter (AG0100) - English Only
item.description: Easily access your TiVo's stored content from any computer at home with the TiVo AG0100 Wi-Fi adapter. Simply connect it to your TiVo device, and it communicates with your wireless router and makes all your movies, shows, and sporting events accessible wherever there’s a computer.
item.FS:LongDescription:
• Easily connect to your 802.11b or 802.11g wireless network and share content with any computer in your home.
  • Enjoy your music, photos, TiVo ToGo, online scheduling and more.
  • Program your TiVo to record from a remote location.
Please Note: both the packaging and instructions booklet are only available in English, though we expect to receive bilingual packaging in late Spring 08. TiVo Customer Support and Activation are only supported in English.

item.title: Insignia 26" LCD/DVD HDTV** (NS-LTDVD26-09CA)
item.description: This 26" Insignia LCD HDTV has it all from a detailed 720p image resolution and built-in DVD player to HDMI and PC connectivity. It’s perfect for the bedroom or office and delivers all the functionality that you’d expect from a much larger and more expensive flat panel display.
item.FS:LongDescription:
Enjoy your favourite movies, TV, sports, and games with the stunning detail of an HD 720p resolution, a fast response time for smooth moving imagery, and hundreds of thousands of colours. A built-in DVD player means that you don’t have to connect any additional devices to watch DVDs – just slide the disc in and press play.
A host of inputs let you connect a plethora of external devices. An HDMI port lets you connect the latest in HD technology including a Blu-ray Disc player, a next-generation game console or home theatre surround sound systems. You can even connect your home computer and enjoy working or gaming on the large, high resolution screen with the built-in PC input.
When it comes to value, space, and functionality, this 26” Insignia LCD HDTV is the perfect fit.

item.title: Insignia 19" LCD/DVD Combo HDTV** (NS-LTDVD19-09CA)

With 720p resolution and HDMI connectivity, this compact widescreen delivers outstanding picture quality for your HD content. Plus, a PC input allows you to connect your computer and use the large 19" screen as a monitor.

item.title: Insignia 26" LCD HDTV** (NS-LCD26-09CA)
item.description: This Insignia 26" LCD TV is loaded with features that let you enjoy your entertainment in high definition. A detailed 720p resolution lets you view your favourite shows, movies and games with stunning clarity, while dual HDMI inputs let you connect up to two HD devices. Plus, with compatible mounting options using VESA specifications, you can place it anywhere you like.

Using an HDMI connection, this 26" LCD brings your entertainment to life in HD 720p resolution. More details, more than 16 million colours, and a sharp 800:1 True Contrast Ratio ensure that everything you watch looks incredible. 2 HDMI inputs and an HD component input allow you to connect up to 3 HD-capable sources, while AV and S-Video inputs give you ample room to connect to a variety of entertainment devices. Plus, the PC input lets you work and play from your computer using the large screen as a monitor. With VESA mounting compatibility, you can save space and mount this 26" LCD TV. And the wide viewing angle makes it easy to enjoy from just about any seat in the room.
**Requires HDTV Source

Built using the highest-quality materials, this 8 meter Ultra-Series HDMI cable delivers the sharpest video and the clearest audio for your HDTV, projector, or high definition audio/video device. Plus, with Monster’s lifetime warranty, this is the last HDMI cable you’ll ever need.
item.FS:LongDescription:
• Corrosion-resistant 24k contacts allow for seamless signal transmission from the cable to the device.
  • Large gauge high purity copper conductors allow the digital signal to travel with unprecedented speed.
  • Nitrogen gas-injected dielectric for optimum signal strength from point A to point B in the signal path.
  • Precision-wound Double Helix construction with Duraflex protective jacket allow for more wear and tear.
  • Lifetime warranty

item.title: Monster 32.8' (10M) Ultra Hi Speed HDMI Cable (ULTV1000HD-10M)
item.description: This Monster Ultra Series 1000 HDMI AV Cable is suited for ultra high-speed High Definition digital video and multi-channel audio in one cable. Perfect for ultimate picture and sound from larger HDTV's, advanced projectors, and high definition AV sources. It features Monster's highest speed HDMI cable for the sharpest picture, deepest colour, and smoothest video.
item.FS:LongDescription:
• Corrosion-Resistant 24k Contacts
  • Large gauge high purity copper conductors.
  • Nitrogen gas-injected dielectric for optimum signal strength.
  • Precision-wound DoubleHelix construction with Duraflex protective jacket.
  • Monster Lifetime Warranty

item.title: Monster 3.2' (1M) Advanced Hi Speed HDMI Cable (HDMI850HD)
item.description: Advanced high speed rated high definition Digital Video and Multi-Channel Audio in one cable, For the latest generation of HDTV's, DVD Players, and Cable/satellite receivers for 1080p picture with vibrant colour, deep blacks and striking clarity.
item.FS:LongDescription: Constructed with large gauge high purity copper conductors, nitrogen injected gas dielectric for maximum signal strength, gold plated heavy duty metal strain relief and connector shield, corrosion resistant 24k gold contacts and high density triple layer shielding for maximum rejection of RFI and EMI. Carry's Monster Lifetime Warranty.

item.title: Insignia Progressive Scan DVD Player (NS-CADVD)
item.description: This Insignia DVD player plays more than just DVDs; it plays CDs, MP3 Discs, and JPEG CDs, too. It comes with a remote control, as well as Component A/V, RCA and digital audio outputs.
item.FS:LongDescription:
• Full Size DVD Player
  • Support DVD/CD/MP3/JPEG CD Discs
  • Full Function Remote Control
  • Audio Output: 2 Channel Analog Output
  • Video Output: CVBS, S-Video, YPbPr
  • Digital Output: Coaxial, Optical
  • Matte surface

item.title: Optoma HD Home Theatre Front Projector (HD65)
item.description: The Optoma HD65 is a 720p home theatre projector that brings accessibility to high-definition, big-screen video content. At 1600 lumens and the latest color processing technologies, the HD65 delivers subtle and incredible image quality and contrast. With a variety of connectivity options, including HDMI v.1.3, the Optoma HD65 reproduces the realism that high-definition offers.
item.FS:LongDescription: Click here to see the 360 view

item.title: Logitech Harmony One Advanced Universal Remote Control (915-00034)
item.description: If you’re looking for a simple solution to a complicated home theatre set-up, look no further than the Harmony One Advanced Universal Remote. It can replace up to 15 remotes and gives you full control of all your audio/video devices through a simple and sleek colour touchscreen display. It’s also rechargeable, so you’ll never have to buy batteries for your remotes again.
item.FS:LongDescription:
One-touch access to your entertainment lets you enjoy easy, one-touch access to the home-entertainment activities you love. Want to watch a DVD? One simple press of the touch screen and the Harmony One remote does the rest. It can replace up to 15 remotes to reduce the clutter and complexity of your living room.
The full-color touch screen gives you easy, one-touch access to any entertainment activity—such as watching a DVD, watching TV, listening to music, and more. Its sculpted, backlit buttons allow you to find the right channel—even in the dark. And the ergonomic design fits comfortably in your hand. Plus, with the rechargeable design you’ll never have to replace expensive and environmentally unfriendly batteries.
You don’t have to be an expert. A guided online setup helps you when you need it. The helpful online setup software and a live customer support team will walk you through the setup and functions. And with the world’s largest A/V control database, your Harmony remote can control virtually any home-entertainment device you have today or buy tomorrow.

item.title: Shaw Standard Definition Digital Cable Box (DCT700) - Western Canada and MB Only
item.description: With the Shaw Digital Cable Terminal, your entertainment universe is constantly expanding. Access hundreds of channels of digital entertainment and services such as Shaw Video On Demand and exclusive Pay Per View programming. Please Note: This product is available in AB, BC and MB only.
item.FS:LongDescription:
• Access to an on-screen interactive TV guide
  • Digital picture quality and exceptional sound
  • Parental controls
  • Easy self-installation
  • An ultra-fast processor, for quick channel tuning
  • Hundreds of channels of entertainment
  • 40 channels of commercial-free digital music
  • Theme packs and specialty Digital channels
  • Shaw Video On Demand
  • Pay Per View movies, sports and special events
  • 24/7/365 Customer Service Support
  • NOTE: Shaw Digital Cable Terminal is only supported in select Shaw markets.

ATT.ATT_NAME: Record One Show While Watching Another

item.title: Dynex 2M HDMI-DVI Cable (DX-C114181)
item.description: High-speed HDMI Cable for connecting a PC or Laptop to an HD Monitor.
item.FS:LongDescription:
• For connecting a PC or laptop with a DVI output to an HD monitor/projector with an HDMI input.
  • Supports monitor resolutions up to 2560 x 1600.
  • Supports single link DVI resolutions up to 2.75 megapixels at 60Hz.

item.title: Samsung 1080p 40" LCD HDTV** (LN40A530)
item.description: If you’re looking for the best picture, Samsung LCD HDTVs have it. This 40" model boasts a Full HD 1080p resolution powered by Samsung’s exclusive DNIe+ image engine with some of the best specs out there. The end result is a high definition viewing experience like no other.
item.FS:LongDescription:
A Full HD 1080p screen resolution offers up to 6 times the resolution as your standard television. This means that you see everything with more clarity and detail, sharper lines, and smooth edges. Thanks to Samsung’s DNIe+ engine, you’ll also experience high contrast with deep, dark blacks and bright whites, as well as super-smooth movement for sports and action scenes. Two 10 watt side-mounted speakers use SRS TruSurround XT technology which emulates the effects of having a full surround sound system. If you already own a surround sound system, simply connect to it and enjoy the immersive nature of 5.1 channels coming at you from all directions. You also have connectivity options. With 3 HDMI ports (2 rear, 1 side) and 2 HD Component inputs, you can connect any next-generation device under the sun - Blu-ray Disc players, game consoles, and more. The integrated ATSC tuner lets you capture any unencrypted high definition signals in your area, and a PC input also lets you connect your home computer and work on the big screen. From amazing picture quality down to its last detail in the very elegant frame, the new Samsung 530 Series combines full HD performance, incredible contrast and clarity. All with award-winning design Samsung is famous for.
**Requires HDTV Source

item.title: RCA 6-Device Universal Remote Control (CRCR6473)
item.description: The RCA CRCR6473 6-device universal remote is easy! Easy to set-up, easy to see, easy to use & guaranteed to work with all brands. This remote can be used to replace or consolidate your existing remotes to control up to 6 separate devices, including TV, DVD, VCR, DVR, AUX, audio, & satellite or cable receivers.
item.FS:LongDescription: Added DVD & DVR functions include previous chapter/skip back, next chapter/skip forward, & slow play keys. The slow play button also doubles as aspect ratio adjustment for changing the way the picture is viewed on a wide screen TV. A dash button has also been added for access to digital sub-channels. The CRCR6473 comes in a new, sleek "snowboard" design. Requires 2 AAA batteries (sold separately).

item.title: Toshiba DVD/VCR Recorder With DivX (D-VR7)
item.description: The Toshiba D-VR7 is an all-in-one VCR and DVD recorder that goes the extra mile in the functionality department. It offers 1080p upconversion when connected to your HDTV with an HDMI cable, as well as DivX, CD, MP3, and WMA file playback. To top it off, the built-in tuner lets you record your favourite shows, movies and sporting events.
item.FS:LongDescription: This amazingly versatile recorder allows you to record both from DVD to VHS or from VHS to DVD, so if you have a large collection of VHS tapes, you can easily transfer them to DVD and enjoy them with for years and years to come. Plus, with 1080p upconverting to your HDTV with an HDMI connection, you'll see them with a renewed sense of visual depth, dimension and clarity. It's also fully compatible with a number of popular file formats, including DivX, CD, MP3 and WMA formats. It also features a digital audio decoder, digital coaxial audio outputs and digital optical audio outputs with support for Dolby Digital and DTS formats, allowing you to connect your digital audio/video surround sound system and enjoy audio in full 5.1 surround sound.

item.title: Samsung Upconverting HDMI DVD Player With 1080P and DivX (DVD-1080P8)
item.description: A DVD player created to push your DVD collection's quality to the next level, the DVD-1080P upconverts the resolution of conventional DVDs to 1080p, producing brilliant sound and picture clarity. This is the DVD player your HDTV has been missing.
item.FS:LongDescription: When connected to your HDTV with HDMI, the Samsung DVD-1080P breathes new life into your old DVD collection by upconverting them from a standard definition resolution to a high definition-comparable one. This allows you to view your movies with renewed detail and clarity - not to mention outstanding audio.

item.title: Optoma 1080p Home Theatre Projector (HD803)
item.description: The Optoma HD803 offers native 1080p resolution, exceptional functionality and features. The HD803 features a 1080p DLP DMD chipset from Texas Instruments and an 8,000:1 contrast ratio with Optoma’s proprietary ImageAI-II technology. The Optoma HD803 delivers excellent colour saturation and subtle details for superior image quality.
item.FS:LongDescription:
• Inputs: HDMI, DVI, Component Video, S-Video, Composite A/V
  • Included In Box: AC Power Cord, Composite Video Cable, RS-232 Cable, Remote Control, Batteries for Remote, Lens Cap, User’s Manual, Warranty Card, Quick Start Guide

item.title: Panasonic Upconverting DVD Player With DivX (DVDS54K)
item.description: The Panasonic DVDS54K DVD player plays your standard definition DVDs, and up-converts them to a high definition resolution when connected to your HDTV. It's also compatible with a myriad of formats – including DivX, so video playback is always crystal clear, no matter what you’re watching.
item.FS:LongDescription:
• CD, VCD, SVCD, CD-R/RW, MP3, WMA, JPEG, DivX, DVD-RAM, DVD-R/RW, DVD-R (DL), +R/+R (DL)/+RW and DVD Compatible
  • High Resolution 1080p Up-conversion
  • Progressive Scan
  • Dolby Digital, DTS Encoder
  • 108 MHz 12-Bit Video DAC Converter
  • VIERA Link
  • Dialogue Enhancer

item.title: Insignia Blu-ray Disc Player (NS-BRDVD)
item.description: If you haven’t seen your favourite movies in Blu-ray, you don’t know what you’re missing. This Insignia Blu-ray Disc player delivers a stunning 1080p resolution for the sharpest picture with the most detail possible on your HDTV. You’ll also enjoy rich HD sound when connected to your home theatre system. It’s an all-encompassing delight to the senses.
item.FS:LongDescription:
• Beautiful Full HD 1080p resolution (1920 x 1080) when connected to your HDTV
  • BD Profile 1.1
  • HDMI capable
  • Upconverts standard definition DVDs to the highest resolution your TV can produce with an HDMI connection
  • Compatible with standard definition DVD, DVD-R/RW, DVD+R/RW CD, CD-R/RW, MP3, WMA, JPEG
  • Supports the latest Dolby Digital and DTS audio formats for incredible surround sound through your home theatre system
  • Built-in SD card slot lets you enjoy and share digital photos on your TV (SD card sold separately)

item.title: Toshiba 1080p DVD Recorder With DivX (DR-7)
item.description: The Toshiba DR-7 1080p Up-converting DVD recorder allows you to easily record your show on DVDs and then view them with a gorgeous up-converted Full HD 1080p resolution. It’s also compatible with many file formats including DivX video, so you’ll never have to worry about file compatibility.
item.FS:LongDescription:
Take your DVDs to a whole new level with HDMI connectivity; you can up-convert your standard DVDs to near HD resolution! Enjoy great sound as well with the built-in digital audio decoders and support for Dolby Digital and DTS. For true playback flexibility, the Toshiba D-R7 also plays DivX video files as well as CD, MP3 and WMA music making this a very functional and versatile player and recorder. If you own an HDTV or entertaining the thought of purchasing one soon, the D-R7 is the perfect solution your needs.
  • Media Playback: DVD-Video, DVD+/-R, DVD+/-RW, DVD+/-R(DL), SVCD, VCD, CD, CD-R, CD-RW, DivX, MP3, JPG

item.title: RCA Amplified Indoor/Outdoor TV Antenna (CANT711)
item.description: The RCA CANT711 amplified indoor/outdoor HDTV/TV/FM antenna makes bulky, unmanageable antennas a thing of the past. Built-in amplification improves the quality of weaker signals. The CANT711 not only provides great reception, but it's new streamlined design is so attractive, you can use it just about anywhere, inside or outside.
item.FS:LongDescription:
• Lightweight, compact, and HDTV compatible.
  • Can be mounted in numerous places, including on a rooftop, in the attic, outside an apartment window, on an RV, on a mast, or on a wall above your TV.
  • Since the CANT711 is paintable, you can colour it to match any interior or exterior setting.
  • Includes mounting accessories.
  • One year limited warranty.

item.title: EastLink High-Definition Cable Box (DCT6200) - Dartmouth, NS Only
item.description: Only available at Darmouth store in Nova Scotia. The EastLink DCT6200 from Motorola is an HDTV Digital Cable terminal that allows you to view image resolutions of up to 1080i on your HDTV. With a constantly growing collection of HD channels, a built-in program guide, and great interactive features like image zoom and stretch, this digital cable terminal will thoroughly enhance your HDTV viewing experience.
item.FS:LongDescription: Please Note: EastLink Cable Boxes are for use with EastLink Cable service. These units are currently usable in Newfoundland, Nova Scotia and PEI. Subscription charges and other fees may apply. With support for screen resolutions of up to HD 1080i, the DCT6200 digital cable terminal will provide you with the razor-sharp and crystal clear detail that only high definition television can produce. The built-in program guide allows you to scroll through all of your available channels to see what's on without ever having to change the channel you’re currently watching. Furthermore, you can search programming by genre, name, time of day, and even set reminders for specific programs. Dolby Digital 5.1 capability provides you with a full and powerful audio. With a Dolby Digital 5.1 audio/video receiver your entire home theatre experience is enhanced by optimized surround sound.* *Broadcast must be available in Dolby Digital 5.1.

item.FS:LongDescription: A gas injected dielectric maintains precise 75 ohm impedance for high velocity signal transfer, regardless of cable bending. Plus, dual-layer shielding rejects interference that can limit frequency response and detail.

With an advanced design and construction that include corrosion-resistant 24k gold contacts and silver-coated copper conductors for improved conductivity, this is the fastest and easiest way to adapt your HDMI and DVI cables and equipment.

item.title: Sony Bravia 40" 1080p 120Hz Flat-Panel LCD HDTV** (KDL40Z4100S)
item.description: If you're looking for an awe-inspiring home theatre experience, look no further than the Sony KDL-Z4100 LCD. It offers the most detailed HD picture with the smoothest on-screen motion and incredibly realistic contrast. It's also got all the connectivity you need for now and the future. So sit back and enjoy.
item.FS:LongDescription: This super slim flat panel delivers a Full HD 1080p image resolution, so everything on-screen is smooth and detailed. It's amazingly fast 120Hz frame refresh rate doubles the amount of frames on the screen, so all on-screen movement is smoother than ever. And now with ACE (Advanced Contrast Enhancer) circuit, you'll experience the darkest blacks and deep detail in darker hues. The bottom mounted speakers come equipped with S-Force Front Surround technology to bring out the best in the audio mix. And it's also easily connected to a home theatre system for full surround sound experience. With 4 HDMI ports, you can connect to all the latest HD devices like Blu-ray Disc players, game consoles, and HD cable boxes/satellite receivers. Easily connect your PC and work on the big screen, or share your digital content through your home network with DNLA technology*. *Additional DNLA components required **Requires HDTV Source

item.title: Sony 160GB DVD Recorder (RDRHX780)
item.description: Equipped with multi-format compatibility, Sony’s RDR-HX780 DVD Recorder is a must-have media unit for today’s high-definition lifestyle. Record up to 24 hours of your favourite shows on a single DVD+DL or DVD-DL disc, pause live TV, and play back DivX and MP3 files. Experience the power of the RDR-HX780 and never miss your favourite moments again.
item.FS:LongDescription: Record, Enjoy, Repeat Now you control your media. Record your favourite programs and organize your DivX and MP3 files all in one place. The RDR-HX780 lets you record up to 160GB of your favourite programs, music and photos for quick access or burn to DVD for easy back-up. Connect to High Definition With HDMI connectivity you’ll discover the awesome power of high definition when you connect to your HDTV. 1080p upconverts your conventional DVDs to take them from their standard format to produce razor-sharp images with crisp, clear audio. Keep it all in sync The BRAVIA Theatre Sync function lets you control all your HDMI connected equipment with the touch of a button. Turn on your television and home theatre system simultaneously with just one touch and eliminate the need for multiple remotes. Multimedia playback: DVD-R/RW, DVD+R/RW, HDD, DVD+/-DL, MP3, CD-R/-RW, DVD-RAM, DivX, JPEG

The LED Surge Indicator ensures that surge protection is functioning properly and a LED ground indicator indicates a grounded connection. Noise Filtration @ EMI/RFI, 40db helps reduce the undesirable results of Electromagnet or Radio frequency interference. Flat Screen TV / Monitor Cleaning Kit: Includes Cleaning Pad, cloth, Cleaning Fluid, and brush, everything required to keep your flat screen smudge and dust free. The patented Micro Fibre triangular cleaning pad is great for cleaning right into each corner of your flat screen television. The 25 x 25cm Micro Fibre Cleaning Cloth won’t scratch your screen; Also great for Laptop Screens and LCD monitors and is gentle enough to be used safely as a CD and DVD disc cleaner; The extra large 200ml Cleaning Solution will last for dozens of uses. A dusting brush enables you to get the dust in those hard to get to areas. 2m HDMI Cable: Ideal for flat panel display installations like LCD or Plasma, It's also HDMI Ver. 1.3 you can rest assured that a full HD experience will be enjoyed by all. 50 Pack of Cable Ties: Helps to clean up the clutter of multiple cables and wires running between your electronic components.

  • 2m Optical Cable: Commonly used for consumer audio equipment (via a "digital optical" socket) where it carries a digital audio stream between components such as DVD, CD, MiniDisc players and digital cable/satellite receivers and is not susceptible to line noise or other electromagnetic phenomena.
  • 25 ft. Gold-plated RCA to RCA Sub-woofer Cable: Extra long so you can reach subwoofer almost anywhere in your Home Theatre room.

item.title: Toshiba 1080P Upconverting DVD Player With DivX (XDE500)
item.description: Experience your DVD collection like never before with Toshiba's XDE-500 1080p DVD player. With an HDMI connection, it will upconvert your standard definition DVDs up to 1080p resolution, reproducing a sharper, more vivid picture. Plus, you can also view photos or listen to music, and enjoy it all with the latest surround sound support.
item.FS:LongDescription:
Take your DVD collection to the next level with 1080p upconversion. With an HDMI connection and compatible HDTV, the XDE-500 breathes new life into your standard DVDs with up to 1080p resolution (depending on your TV's capabilities). Colours and detail are sharper and more vibrant than ever before, giving your old favourites a new, enhanced look. Other entertainment enhancing features:
Dolby Digital and DTS decoders create a rich, immersive soundscape with precise audio reproduction. ColorStream Pro progressive-scan component video output delivers extraordinarily colourful images to compatible TVs and virtually eliminate dot crawl and flicker. 3 picture enhancement modes include Sharp for added edge detail, Colour for the richest blues and greens, and Contrast to ensure details in darker scenes are greatly enhanced. The JPEG viewer allows you to view digital images with enhanced resolutions for amazing slideshows. Multi-format playback means the XDE-500 lets you enjoy your favourite entertainment from DVDs and CDs, as well as DivX, SVCD, MP3, WMA and JPEG files. A digital zoom function lets you select an area of the picture and magnify it or increase the viewable screen area for letterbox films. A variety of viewing options include: fast scan, slow motion, multi-camera angle select, multi-language select and multi-subtitle select. Outputs include 1 HDMI, 1 S-video, 1 ColorStream component video, 1 coaxial digital audio, 1 composite video, and 1 A/V so you can connect to a variety of components. HDMI-CEC functionality means you can control multiple components with a single remote (additional components not included). Integrated parental controls keep children from being exposed to undesirable content. A trilingual on-screen display lets you choose from English, French or Spanish menus.

ATT.ATT_VALUE: DVD, DVD+/-R/RW, SVCD, VCD, CD, CD-R/RW

item.title: Sharp AQUOS 1080p 120Hz 42" LCD HDTV** (LC42D85)
item.description: With a name like Sharp, you expect the crispest colours, realistic details, and stunning clarity in everything you watch. And with this AQUOS 42" LCD HDTV, you get just that. It comes equipped with Full HD 1080p resolution, a 4ms response time, 120Hz refresh rate and Sharp’s advanced technologies to give you what you need for the ultimate viewing experience.
item.FS:LongDescription:
For the best colour and detail in images, it doesn’t get any better than 1920x1080 resolution - and when you combine it with a 4ms response time for blur-free images and 120Hz Fine Motion Enhanced for the smoothest picture quality in fast-moving scenes, you’ve got an HDTV that delivers a breathtaking viewing experience. Sharp technologies take your viewing experience even further with the combined power of a 10-bit panel and 10-bit processing to produce 64x more colour and smooth gradations. Plus, the Advanced Super View/Black TFT Panel with Spectral Contrast Engine delivers truer blacks and high brightness levels for crystal-clear viewing from just about anywhere in the room. Advanced specs include:
  • Two HD component and five HDMI v1.3 inputs with x.v.Colour for HD connectivity
  • One PC input so you can work from your computer using the 52" LCD as a monitor
  • Two built-in 10-watt speakers for enhanced audio
  • Energy saving mode, dynamic backlight, and AQUOS Link function
