item.title: Digital Innovations SkipDR Classic Disc Cleaner (60146CA)
item.description: n Your Dirty Discs Safely. Dust, dirt, and fingerprints found on your discs can cause skipping, freezing and distortion. The SkipDr Classic Cleaner can quickly and easily clean music, game, DVD, data and photo discs with its non-abrasive microfiber cloth and disc cleaning solution.
item.FS:LongDescription: It comes with a 8" x 8" microfibre cloth and 4 oz disc cleaning solution. Microfibre cloth is machine washable.

item.title: Dimplex 37" - 56" Flat-Panel TV Electric Fireplace (DFP6854B)
item.description: This Dimplex AV unit with electric fireplace offers year round ambience while watching your favourite movies or TV shows. The built-in fireplace produces up to 1,500 watts of heat to add warmth to any room, and the unit will hold your TV up to 56" in size. Plus, it also offers enough space to store DVDs, accessories, and other media equipment. *Note: LCD TV Sold Separately.
item.FS:LongDescription:
• Ideal as a secondary heat source adding warmth to rooms up to 500 sq. ft. in size.
  • Fireplace flame operates with or without heater function.
  • Solid wood unit holds TVs up to 56".
  • Removable cable access panels at back for easy install of cables and connectors.
  • Plenty of storage for media accessories, DVDs and more.
  • Piano black finish.

item.title: Sony Blu-ray Disc Player (BDPS550)
item.description: Not only is it loaded with advanced features to deliver incredible high definition sights and sounds, but the Sony BDP-S550 Blu-ray Disc player is equipped with BD Live and it will change the way you enjoy movies. With an Internet connection, BD Live gives you access to bonus content from select Blu-ray titles to enhance your entertainment experience.
item.FS:LongDescription:
With an HDMI connection, the BDP-S550 can output a Full 1080/24p True Cinema picture for the most incredible detail and lifelike images. Blu-ray technology delivers up to 5 times the resolution of standard DVDs, so images are clearer, sharper, and as real as life. Plus, it will upscale your existing DVD collection up to 1080p on your compatible HDTV via HDMI (HDMI cable sold separately).
  • A Profile 2.0 BD player right out of the box, the BDP-S550 features BD Live so you're ready to download and stream bonus content, such as additional scenes, trailers, movie-based games, and more with a BD Live-capable disc (Requires Internet connection)
  • Includes a 1GB flash drive for BD Live, so you can store downloaded content
  • Connect to your home theatre set-up for the ultimate listening experience; on-board decoding of next-generation audio formats including Dolby TrueHD, Dolby Digital Plus, Dolby Digital and DTS-HD, means you'll experience 7.1 uncompressed audio
  • A 7.1 channel analog output provides easy connectivity to older receivers that use 7.1 analog inputs
  • The backlit remote is ideal for late-night movie watching
  • The icon-based Xcross Media Bar provides simple navigation of the player's menu system.
  • Bonus View "picture-in-picture" capability with select Blu-ray titles
  • Ethernet port for Internet connectivity
  • BRAVIA Sync compatible (HDMI-CEC)
  • USB port for BD Live external memory

item.title: Monster Blackout Power Centre (HDP910)
item.description: The Monster Blackout Power Centre HDP910 offers advanced surge protection for your electronic devices. This 8-foot cable is equipped with cutting-edge features like Monster's HD Clean Power Stage 1 Circuitry filter and patented Tri-Mode surge protection, making it ideal for today's high-definition technology.
item.FS:LongDescription:
• Monster's HD Clean Power Stage 1 circuitry filter dramatically reduces electronic noise
  • Patented Tri-Mode surge protection automatically disconnects your AV equipment (both line and neutral power lines) and sounds an alarm if hit by a big surge
  • A 3780 Joule rating provides a high level of surge protection
  • 8 ultra-spaced colour-coded AC outlets are backlit for easy identification with matching cord labels
  • One pair of each surge-protected ultra-low loss coax cable and phone connections with splitter protects all lines connected to your hardware
  • Long 8-foot PowerLine cable with flat-profile plug that easily reaches a wall outlet and lays flat to fit behind furniture
  • This unit carries Monster's Lifetime warranty and a $250,000 connected equipment warranty

item.title: Monster Blackout Power Centre (HDP660)
item.description: Designed for today's high-definition technology, the Monster Blackout HDP660 Power Centre offers advanced surge protection for your electronic devices. Equipped with advanced Monster features like the HD Clean Power Stage 1 Circuitry filter and Advanced Dual Mode Plus, the HDP660 offer a high level of performance for peace of mind.
item.FS:LongDescription:
• Monster's HD Clean Power Stage 1 circuitry filter dramatically reduces electronic noise
  • Advanced Dual Mode Plus surge protection automatically disconnects your AV equipment and sounds an alarm if hit by a big surge
  • A 2160 Joule rating provides a high level of surge protection
  • Six ultra-wide spaced, colour-coded AC outlets are backlit for easy identification with matching cord labels
  • One pair of each surge-protected ultra-low loss coax cable and phone connections with splitter to protect all lines connected to your hardware
  • Six-foot PowerLine cable with FlatProfile plug that easily reaches wall outlets and lays flat to fit behind furniture
  • This unit carries a $200,000 Connected Equipment Warranty, as well as Monster's lifetime warranty

item.title: Sanus 15" - 42" Full-Motion Flat-Panel TV Wall Mount (VM400S-01)
item.description: The Sanus VisionMount VM400 is a full-motion wall mount bracket for medium flat-panel LCD TVs. Its extruded aluminium and solid steel construction offer a sleek, high-tech look while providing strength and durability. And with its full-motion capabilities and Virtual Axis tilting system, it’s easy to adjust your mounted flat-panel for easy viewing from just about any angle.
item.FS:LongDescription:
• Universal design makes it ideal for a variety of 15" to 40" flat-panel LCD TVs weighing up to 80lbs.
  • Virtual Axis technology offers effortless tilting of your flat-panel TV with finger-tip pressure from 5 degrees up to 15 degrees down
  • The articulated arm of the bracket will hold the TV just 3.5" (8.89cm) away from the wall and extend it up to 20" (50.8cm)
  • Swivel your TV up to 90 degrees left or right (dependant on your TV’s width)
  • A built-in roll adjustment of up to 6 degrees ensures your TV can be levelled
  • Single stud mounting
  • Compatible with multiple VESA bolt hole patterns
  • Includes mounting hardware

item.title: Black & Decker Power Monitor (EM100B)
item.description: The Black & Decker Power Monitor is the first product of its kind that will give you the opportunity to "know more, use less and save money" up to 20% of your electric bill. The Monitor will show your current energy usage in real dollars, your month to date usage, estimate your monthly bill, and even tell you how much it costs you to run a specific appliance and as well will show you the temperature outside.
item.FS:LongDescription: The Power Monitor, is simple to install and use. It can be installed in just a few minutes with a simple screwdriver, simply place the ring over your miter and tighten and you have completed the installation, the next step is in put your electric bill information in the monitor using the simple step-by-step easy to read instructions.

item.title: Panasonic 46" 1080p Plasma HDTV** (THC46FD18)
item.description: The Panasonic THC46FD18 1080p plasma has the ability to beautifully reproduce fast-moving images, rendering every detail with such amazing clarity and unbelievable fluidity. A variety of inputs keeps you connected to the latest HD content, and the durable TUF display features an anti-reflective filter, delivers the purest colours, and maintains superior image quality.
item.FS:LongDescription: The Right Specs With 1080p resolution, super high contrast ratios and the ability to reproduce billions of colours, this plasma delivers the most amazing images via HDMI. This results in warm, accurate skin tones, deep blacks, gorgeous greens, breathtaking blues and vivid reds for colour that's as rich and bold as life itself. Plus, it covers 100% of the colour gamut for the best possible picture across the entire colour spectrum. The Right Technology This plasma features a Tough Under Force (TUF) display that makes it safe for active children and is easy to clean, while the anti-reflective filter dramatically reduces reflections for easy viewing even in sunlit rooms. And an integrated Game mode allows for faster response with improved shading and detail. The Right Connections With the THC46FD18, you're ready to connect to all the latest digital devices. 3 HDMI, 2 HD component, composite and PC inputs let you hook up Blu-ray and DVD players, next-generation game consoles, HD cable boxes, satellite receivers, or your computer. Plus, the built-in SD card slot lets you enjoy and share photo slideshows on the large 46" screen. **Requires HDTV Source

item.title: Toshiba 46" 1080p LCD HDTV** (46RV525R)
item.description: For the most vivid colours and incredible true-to-life images, you'll want Full HD 1080p resolution and the Toshiba 46RV525R has it. Featuring Dynalight backlight technology and the ability to reproduce millions of colours, your entertainment will come alive across the gorgeous 46" screen. And with a variety of inputs, you’re only a connection away from your favourite media.
item.FS:LongDescription: The Right Specs With an HDMI connection and Full HD 1080p resolution, you’ll experience images so lifelike and detailed, they’ll seem real. Plus, the high contrast ratio and more than 68 million colours ensure everything is incredibly vivid. The Right Technology Toshiba's Dynalight technology monitors brightness levels and adjusts the backlight accordingly. It produces deeper blacks and superior colour and image reproduction, resulting in deeper greens in grass, deeper blues in water, and enhanced dark scenes. An innovative gaming mode reduces input lag to create a smoother gaming experience, while Native mode eliminates overscanning of the TV picture so you see more of the action. And with Q-Sound technology, all your entertainment comes alive with rich, immersive audio. The Right Connections The 46RV525R is ready for Blu-ray and DVD players, the latest gaming consoles, and more with 3 HDMI inputs, 2 ColourStream HD inputs, as well as S-Video and composite inputs. Plus, a PC input lets you work and play from your computer using the large 46" LCD as a monitor.

item.title: Sony Bravia 52" 1080p 240Hz LCD HDTV** (KDL52XBR7)
item.description: With four times the frame rate of standard HDTVs, the Sony KDL-52XBR7 LCD TV delivers high definition like never before with its Motionflow 240Hz technology.
item.FS:LongDescription:
Add to that Full HD 1080p resolution, a powerful BRAVIA 2 Engine, high contrast ratios, and a variety of HD-compatible inputs, and you’ll be able to enjoy stunningly lifelike images across the gorgeous 52" widescreen. The KDL-52XBR7 features Motionflow 240Hz technology, which quadruples the frame rate of standard HDTVs, resulting in the crispest, smoothest motion for the most realistic images possible. An HDMI connection delivers Full HD 1080p resolution, 80,000:1 dynamic contrast ratio, and 3000:1 true contrast ratio, for a riveting high definition experience. It's also outfitted with the BRAVIA Engine 2 digital video processor that renders stunning images from just about any resolution. An Advanced Contrast Enhancer dynamic backlight control produces deep blacks in dark scenes without sacrificing shadow detail, while a 178-degree viewing angle makes for easy viewing just about anywhere in the room. Get connected with 4 HDMI inputs, 2 HD component inputs, as well as A/V, S-Video, PC and USB inputs. This HDTV has got what you need to hook up a Blu-ray player, next-generation game console, your computer, digital media player, or a satellite receiver. Plus, the built-in speakers deliver incredible sound with MTS and S-Force technologies.
  • Display Capabilities: 480/60i, 480/60p, 720p, 1080/60i, 1080/24p (HDMI only), 1080/60p (HDMI/Component)

item.description: This 2-way coaxial splitter splits incoming coaxial cable signal into two outgoing signals. A typical use would be splitting an incoming cable TV signal so that you could run it to 2 televisions. It includes 2 mounting screws and 1 ground wire screw.

item.title: Dynex 3-Way Coaxial Splitter (DX-AV101)
item.description: This 3-way coaxial splitter splits incoming coaxial cable signal into three outgoing signals. A typical use would be splitting an incoming cable TV signal so that you could run it to multiple televisions. It includes 2 mounting screws and 1 ground wire screw.

It has gold-plated connectors for maximum signal transfer.

item.title: Init 50" Flat-Panel TV Stand (NT-MG005)
item.description: This Int TV stand accommodates flat panel TVs up to 50". The max weight capacity is 300lbs and the scratch-resistant steel frame makes this durable. It has clear glass shelves, cable management system, and the two components shelves provide ample space for components and sound bars.

item.title: Rocketfish 4-Way HDMI Switch (RF-HDMI4)
item.description: Expand the connectivity options on your HDTV or audio video receiver with this Rocketfish HDMI switch. It lets you connect up to 4 HDMI-enabled devices you're your Blu-ray player, HD camcorder, game console and cable box through a single HDMI input on your TV or receiver.
item.FS:LongDescription:
• HDMI switch connects to your HDTV or AV receiver via a single HDMI input and supports up to 4 devices, expanding the number of HDMI-enabled devices you can enjoy on your TV
  • Supports Full HD 1080p pass-through, so you enjoy the full video resolution of your HD content
  • Plug-and-play installation
  • Includes remote for switching inputs

item.title: Coby 1080p Upconverting DVD Player with DivX (DVD298)
item.description: When you connect this Coby DVD player to your compatible HDTV, you'll enjoy an enhanced viewing experience. It can upconvert your DVD collection up to 1080p resolution via HDMI, so images are crisper, brighter and more vivid than before. And with its multi-format playback capability, you'll be able to enjoy a wide variety of your favourite media.
item.FS:LongDescription:
• With an HDMI connection, it can upconvert DVD video to near-HD quality up to 1080p, depending on your display's capabilities
  • Plays digital media files directly from USB drives and SD/MMC memory cards
  • An HDMI output delivers digital signal transmission to your compatible home theatre system over a single cable
  • Digital and analog AV outputs
  • DVD, DVD+-/R/RW, MPEG-4, and JPEG compatible
  • Plays all versions of DivX video including DivX 6 with standard playback of DivX media files
  • Formats supported: DVD, DVD+R/RW, CD, CD-R/RW, USB, SD/MMC Card
  • NTSC/PAL compatible
  • Convenient front-panel and on-screen display
  • Multiple language, subtitle and camera angle support
  • Parental lock control

item.title: Logitech Harmony 1100 Universal Remote (915-000075)
item.description: The Logitech Harmony 1100 universal remote gives you the power to control your home entertainment with just one device. Equipped with a customizable, 3.5" full-colour touchscreen, the 1100 offers one-touch, activity-based controls that turn on the right devices with a single command.
item.FS:LongDescription:
• A 3.5", colour touchscreen lets you access the most-used buttons with one hand or two, and it’s backlit so you can see your icons even in the dark
  • One-touch, activity-based controls turn on the right devices in the right order with a single command
  • Customizable on-screen commands and icons let you choose which commands you see and when
  • Rechargeable, complete with charging stand
  • Supports over 5,000 brands and more than 225,000 devices
  • Replaces up to 15 remotes
  • RF wireless capability lets you control devices you can’t see when you add the Logitech Harmony RF Extender (sold separately)
  • High-speed USB 2.0 connectivity
  • Help button
  • Online setup wizard and AV database (Internet connection required)
  • System requirements: PC with Windows 2000, Windows XP, Windows Vista or Macintosh computer with Mac OS X (10.3 or above)

item.title: Insignia 21.6" 720p LCD HDTV** (NS-L22Q-10A)
item.description: Ideal for your office, kitchen or bedroom, this Insignia 21.6" LCD HDTV will bring your entertainment to life in high definition. With an HDMI connection, you’ll enjoy a vibrant 720p resolution that makes images dance across the screen with amazing colour and clarity. Plus, with multiple inputs, you'll be able to connect to your favourite digital devices.
item.FS:LongDescription:
Stunning images come alive on this LCD HDTV's 21.6" display with 1366x768 (720p) resolution via HDMI. And with its super-fast 5ms response time, even fast-moving images will appear with incredible detail.
Equipped with two HDMI inputs and 1 HD component input, you can hook up to a variety of HD sources including a Blu-ray player, next-generation gaming console, satellite receiver, or cable box. A PC input even lets you connect to your computer, so you can use the large 21.6" display as a monitor.
**Requires HDTV Source

item.title: Sony Bravia 32" LCD HDTV** (KDL32L5000)
item.description: Bring high definition entertainment to your living room with the Sony KDL-32L5000. This BRAVIA L-Series LCD HDTV delivers 720p resolution, an 8ms response time and 13,000:1 dynamic contrast ratio for rich, detailed images across the 32" screen. And with a variety of inputs, it integrates seamlessly into your home theatre setup.
item.FS:LongDescription:
With an HDMI connection, the KDL-32L5000 lets you enjoy breathtaking views in 720p/1080i resolution. Sony's BRAVIA Engine delivers vivid colours and crisp detail, as well as ultra-smooth fast-moving images thanks to an 8ms response time. Plus, the 13,000:1 dynamic contrast ratio helps to bring out the detail in shadows and dark scenes.
3 HDMI and 2 HD component video inputs give you what you need to connect to a variety of high-definition sources. And with two built-in 20W (10W x 2) speakers, everything you watch will sound as sweet as it looks.
The BRAVIA L-Series also features Dynamic Backlight Control, which automatically controls overall image brightness and reduces power consumption by up to 50 percent.

item.title: Monster Power 11-Outlet High-Definition PowerCenter Surge Protector
item.description: Monster HDP 2500 High Definition Power Center provides AC Power Protection for Home Theatre Components and Surge protected Coax, Phone, and Network Connections for Cable TV/Satellite/TiVo/Network Protection. Features Monster HD Clean Power Stage 2v2.1 circuitry filter which dramatically reduces electronic noise.
item.FS:LongDescription:
T2 automatic disconnect/reconnect surge protection circuitry. Patented Tri-Mode surge protection automatically disconnects both line and neutral power lines and sounds an alarm.
  • 6066 joule rating provides enhanced surge protection.
  • 11 AC outlets provide power for TV, DVD, A/V receiver/satellite and an accessory.
  • 1 pair of coaxial outlets for cable TV, satellite and UHF/VHF provide full surge protection and minimal insertion loss.
  • 1 pair of protected phone connections with a splitter and 1 pair of network connections.
  • 2 pairs of ultralow-loss 2.8GHz satellite connections.
  • Clean Power Stage 2 circuitry filter provides noise-free power to your electronic components.
  • Tri-Mode surge protection automatically disconnects both line and neutral power lines and sounds an alarm.
  • Colour-coded outlets prevent you from unplugging the wrong device.
  • Blue LED digital meter displays voltage.
  • Monster Power $400,000 connected equipment warranty.

item.title: Coby Digital Converter Box (DTV102)
item.description: The Coby DTV102 ATSC Standard-Definition Converter Box converts over-the-air digital television signals for your standard definition TV (480i). It's compatible with all ATSC signal formats and features easy-to-use, on-screen Electronic Program Guide support.

  • Receives free Over-the-Air (OTA) Digital Television signals

item.title: Samsung 50" Plasma HDTV** (PN50B450)
item.description: Samsung's 450 Series plasma HDTV delivers an unparalleled viewing experience. You'll be immersed in incredible high definition images across this gorgeous 50" screen, while a 2,000,000:1 Mega Dynamic Contrast ratio and FilterBright technology work to minimize glare and maximize contrast, so your favourite entertainment isn't interrupted by bright lights.

With 3 HDMI and 2 HD component inputs, you've got what you need to connect with a variety of high definition sources and enjoy razor-sharp images in beautiful 720p (1024x768) resolution. A 600Hz sub-field drive ensures images move smoothly and naturally on the 50" screen. Powered by a 2,000,000:1 Mega Dynamic Contrast ratio and FilterBright technology, the PN50B450 minimizes glare and maximizes contrast, so you can watch TV in brightly lit rooms without annoying reflections. Day or night, you'll enjoy deep, rich blacks and reduced glare for crisp, clear viewing with vivid colours. Two built-in 10 Watt speakers with SRS TruSurround HD technology ensure sounds are as crisp and clear as the sights you'll see. With an ENERGY STAR 3.0 rating, this lead-free plasma is eco-friendly too.

Plus, it's mercury-free, contains no toxic materials or volatile organic compounds, and uses 40 percent less power than a traditional LCD HDTV, exceeding the Energy Star 3.0 standard. Lean, Green Measuring a sliver-like 1.16", this 6000 Series uses LEDs as its primary light source rather than conventional CCFLs to express the deepest black levels and a stunningly high Mega Dynamic Contrast Ratio for crisp detail and colours. Plus, it’s mercury-free, contains no toxic materials or volatile organic compounds, and uses 40 percent less power than a traditional LCD HDTV, exceeding the Energy Star 3.0 standard. And Feature-Rich On the outside, its Touch of Colour design adds elegance to your living room, while inside it houses:
  • Full HD 1080p resolution for breathtaking, true-to-life images via HDMI
  • Auto Motion Plus 120Hz to reduce motion judder for smoother, fast-moving scenes
  • Wide Colour Enhancer Pro for a broader range of vibrant colours
  • 4 HDMI inputs and 1 HD video component input
  • Wiselink USB 2.0 input so you can enjoy videos, photos and music from a digital media player
  • Built-in ATSC tuner
  • SRS TruSurround HD so everything you hear is as sweet as it looks
  • Built-in Ethernet port for access to Samsung’s InfoLink RSS service for news, sports, weather and stock information with a touch of the remote (Requires Internet connection)
  • **Requires HDTV Source

item.title: Panasonic 32" LCD HDTV** (TCL32X1)
item.description: Place the Panasonic TCL32X1 32" LCD HDTV in your bedroom, office or living room and enjoy your entertainment in beautiful 720p resolution. It's loaded with all the inputs you need to get connected to your entertainment devices, and comes with an iPod dock so you can play back your music and video directly through this VIERA HDTV.

With an HDMI connection, 720p resolution brings your movies, games and sports to life with incredible colour and clarity. And with the 12,000:1 Dynamic Contrast Ratio, which produces deep colours so you see more detail in dark scenes, everything will look brilliant on this 32" display. Get connected to a variety of HD sources with 3 HDMI inputs and 1 HD component video input. An innovative Game Mode allows for faster response with improved shading and detail, while a wide 178-degree viewing angle lets you sit anywhere in the room and see it all clearly. The VIERA Image Viewer allows you to simply insert an SD card into your VIERA to display high resolution photos on the large screen. This 50" plasma also features a VIERA Image Viewer so you can watch and show your photos right from your SD cards. Plus, its innovative Game Mode allows for faster response with improved shading and detail for an enhanced experience.

item.title: Toshiba 1-Disc DVD Player (SD4200)
item.description: Enjoy your DVD movie collection with Toshiba's stylish SD4200 DVD player. Enhanced image quality with ColorStream Pro component video outputs and numerous playback options make it great for watching movies or viewing slideshows of your favourite digital photos.
item.FS:LongDescription: Its slimline 40mm design makes the SD4200 a sleek addition in your entertainment cabinet. View photos and videos from CDs or DVDs - with built-in DivX playback support up to DivX 6, MP3 and WMA support, as well as JPEG photos, your entertainment possibilities are endless.

item.title: Toshiba 1080p Upconverting DVD Player With DviX (SD7200)
item.description: Get the most out of your DVD collection with Toshiba's SD7200 1080p upconverting DVD player. With an HDMI connection, you'll enjoy near HD quality entertainment on your compatible HDTV, so your standard definition DVD movies appear more vivid and detailed than ever before. Plus, it supports multi-format playback, so you can enjoy your videos and photos with ease.
item.FS:LongDescription:
Up to 1080p upconversion via HDMI gives you near HD quality, which is ideal for your compatible HDTV. And with REGZA-Link (HDMI-CEC), you can control your HDMI-CEC compliant HDTV, A/V receiver and the SD7200 with one remote, so you can start watching your movie with the touch of a button.
It also supports a variety of different file formats, so you can enjoy home videos, JPEG photos, or MP3 and WMA files that you’ve recorded to DVD or CD, DivX files (version 3-6), and audio CDs.
Media Playback: DVD Video, DVD+/-R, DVD+/-RW, DivX, CD Audio, CD-R, CD-RW, VCD, SVCD, JPEG

item.title: Toshiba 9" Portable DVD Player (SDP93SW)
item.description: Add some entertainment to your long journeys with the Toshiba SDP93SW 9" portable DVD player. It’s equipped with a brilliant 9" TFT LCD screen that provides a great viewing experience no matter where you go. With up to 5 hours of battery life, you can enjoy multiple movies before you need to recharge.
item.FS:LongDescription:
• Dual headphone jacks and a 9" swivel screen make it easy to share your entertainment
  • A built-in SD card slot lets you view photos and videos
  • Switchable audio/video inputs and outputs allow you to take your entertainment to the big screen
  • Multi-format playback supports DVD movies, as well as recorded DVDs, VCDs, SVCDs, MP3s, WMAs, DivX video, and SD cards

item.title: Toshiba DVD/VHS Combo Player (SDV398)
item.description: Why have two players when one can do the job? Toshiba's SDV398 DVD/VCR combination player allows you to enjoy your DVD collection, as well as your classics on VHS cassettes, all in the convenience of one player. And with built-in playback support for DVD recordables, DVD rewritables, JPEG and MP3 files - your entertainment options just got a lot better.
item.FS:LongDescription:
• A built-in NTSC tuner also allows you to tune analog cable channels and record them onto VHS cassettes
  • Easy to use with the built-in timer and intuitive menu system, you'll be able to maximize space while enjoying DVD or VHS movies
  • 4-head Hi-Fi VHS playback and records SP/SLP on VHS
  • Multi-format playback supports DVD-/+R, DVD-/+RW, DVD-R DL, DVD+R DL, VCD, SVCD, CD-R, CD-RW, MP3, WMA, and JPEG for true viewing flexibility
  • JPEG Photo Viewer enables users to view digital photographs from CD and DVD discs on their televisions

item.title: Sony Bravia 52" 1080p LCD HDTV** (KDL52S5100)
item.description: The Sony KDL-52S5100 BRAVIA LCD HDTV makes it easy to bring high definition movies, games and shows into your home. It features Full HD 1080p resolution and a high 30,000:1 dynamic contrast ratio, so you experience the most vivid, lifelike images across the large 52" screen. And Sony's BRAVIA Engine 2 ensures your entertainment is razor-sharp and vibrant.
item.FS:LongDescription:
Powered by Sony's BRAVIA 2 Engine technology, this LCD HDTV offers rich, lifelike images for all your entertainment. And with an HDMI connection, you'll be able to step into the world of high definition with Full 1080p resolution - images from movies, games and shows will dance across the screen with incredible realism. And with 24p True Cinema capabilities, you'll watch movies like never before. Get connected to HD entertainment with 3 HDMI and 2 HD component inputs - a Blu-ray player, next-generation game console, satellite receiver, or cable box - no matter what you choose, you'll be able to watch all your favourite movies, sports and games with amazing clarity.
**Requires HDTV Source

item.title: Panasonic 8.9" Portable Blu-ray Player (DMPB15K)
item.description: With a high-quality 8.9" LCD screen, the Panasonic DMPB15K features a stylish design that makes it easy to watch Blu-ray movies anywhere. It stands upright like a photo stand and folds up easily for ultra-portability. Plus, you can hook it up to your compatible home theatre system and HDTV, and enjoy HD content on the big screen.
item.FS:LongDescription:
With a vibrant 8.9" WSVGA LCD screen, this portable Blu-ray player lets you view movies with a much higher image quality than standard definition portable DVD players. And you can enjoy more than just Blu-ray movies - view content from SD memory cards, DVDs and CDs, too. The DMPB15K also boasts a 2.5-hour rechargeable battery.
Additionally, the DMPB15K can be connected to an HDTV via an HDMI cable, and also to an HD-audio compatible AV receiver with a home theatre speaker system. It supports 1080/24p playback, 7.1-channel audio and the latest HD audio formats, so you can enjoy the best sights and sounds possible from your home theatre components.

ATT.ATT_VALUE: DD, DD+, Dolby True HD, DTSHD

item.title: Samsung Blu-ray Disc Player (BDP3600)
item.description: This is Blu-ray taken to the next level. The BD-P3600 perfectly decodes the latest high resolution multi-channel audio soundtracks, supports Full HD 1080p playback, and lets you wirelessly stream MP3, DivX and JPEG files from your computer to the TV. Plus, BD Live can be enabled wirelessly through the included dongle and the 1GB internal flash memory.
item.FS:LongDescription:
With an HDMI connection to your compatible HDTV, the BD-P3600 supports Full HD 1080p playback, so you get every single pixel out of a film possible. Images are natural, realistic and absolutely stunning. It can also upconvert standard DVDs to near HD quality.
Connect to your home theatre system for the ultimate audio experience in up to 7.1ch. This player can decode or bit-stream Dolby TrueHD and DTS-HD Master Audio to provide lossless audio that's identical to the studio master delivering a surreal surround sound experience.
Enjoy digital content from your PC on your HDTV via Samsung's networked Blu-ray player. Using a wireless or wired connection you can access DivX, MP3 and JPEG files on your home computer all from the convenience of your Blu-ray player’s remote control.
BD Live (Blu-ray profile 2.0) enables you to download additional content and interactive features directly to your Blu-ray player via internet connection with compatible discs.

ATT.ATT_VALUE: H.264, VC-1, HD JPEG, MPEG 2/4, AVC HD
DD/DD+; DTS; Dolby TrueHD; DTS-HD Master

item.description: Control your entire systems with the press of just one button. Simply select an activity and your Harmony remote will evaluate the state of all your components and then send the right commands to make your system do exactly what you want.

  • Page buttons for On-Screen Guide Navigation.
  • Stylish sporty look with comfortable button layout for TiVo/PVR control.

  • Backlight Glow: Backlighting makes the buttons and interactive display glow brightly for easy use in the dark.
  • Learning Port: Just point your original remote at the Learning Port to capture and use any infrared command with the Harmony Remote.

  • Built-in decoders for next-generation Dolby Digital Plus and Dolby TrueHD
  • Plays BD-ROM, BD-R and BD-RE discs; backward compatible with DVD-R, DVD-RW, DVD-ROM, CD and CD-R/RW discs
  • Built-in Ethernet port for network connection and firmware upgrades
  • 10-bit/108MHz video digital-to-analog (D/A) conversion
  • 24-bit/192kHz audio digital-to-analog (D/A) converter
  • 24fps output for smooth film-like picture quality
  • USB 2.0 port supports flash media
  • Outputs: 1 component video, 1 composite video, 1 HDMI, 2-channel stereo audio, 1 optical digital audio
  • Anynet+ (HDMI-CEC) networking lets you operate compatible HDMI products with a single remote

ATT.ATT_VALUE: H.264, VC-1, HD JPEG, MPEG 2/4, AVC HD

Click here to see the 360 view
Full HD 1080p resolution offers realistic colours and detail with breathtaking clarity via HDMI. Toshiba's innovative Dynalight technology monitors the brightness level of each video frame and adjusts the brightness level of the backlight accordingly. You’ll enjoy deeper greens in grass, deeper blues in water, and deeper blacks that bring out all the detail in dark scenes. Gamers can also rejoice with an innovative Gaming mode that reduces input lag to create a smoother, more enjoyable gaming experience. Native mode eliminates overscanning (or cropping) of your picture, so you see all the action. item.title: Toshiba Regza 52" 1080p 120Hz LCD HDTV** (52XV645U)
item.description: There's high definition and then there's high definition. Get the latter with the 645U series LCD from Toshiba. It features a razor sharp Full HD 1080p resolution, Clearframe 120Hz frame conversion technology and Toshiba's PixelPure 5G 14-bit video processor. It's also equipped with 3 HDMI inputs and a PC input, giving you abundant connectivity options.
item.FS:LongDescription:
Important Specs at a Glance:
  • Full HD 1080p resolution (1920 x 1080 native resolution)
  • 120Hz frame refresh rate
  • 10,000:1 true contrast ratio (50,000:1 dynamic contrast ratio)
  • 3 HDMI input, 1 PC input
More About This Model: The Toshiba 645U series LCDs deliver so much more than just a high definition resolution. Clearframe 120Hz frame conversion technology effectively doubles the display's frame rate, so on-screen motion is as smooth as can be. The PixelPure 5G 14-bit video processor, in its 5th generation, is capable of producing 16,384 shades of gradation creating smoother, life like images and precise colours for the most accurate picture rendition possible, while a very high 10,000:1 true contrast ratio delivers the brightest whites and deepest blacks. No longer will you have to worry about a picture that isn’t set bright enough for the afternoon sunlight or eye strain from an overly bright TV in a darkened room. Toshiba’s enhanced AutoView feature helps ensure the best possible image quality at all times of the day. Finally, Toshiba pulls it all together with the Deep Lagoon Design, which was inspired by the beauty of nature and delivers a 3D feeling to a clean and flat design. Toshiba takes a stringent, 22-point environmental performance survey on all products for greener, more environmentally-sound technology. **Requires HDTV Source

item.description: With its Full HD 1080p resolution, 10,000:1 dynamic contrast ratio and unique Vyper Drive game mode, Sharp's AQUOS LC-32GP3U-R was built for gamers. Whether you're enjoying games, movies or shows, every image will be bursting with the most amazing colours and detail, along with razor-sharp motion thanks to this LCD TV's:

And that's not all This GP3U series is optimized for today's state-of-the-art video games. A unique Vyper Drive game mode eliminates any perceptible lag between the video game and the TV, while side-mounted terminals provide easy connections. A custom remote includes a "Game" button that quickly jumps into Vyper Drive and activates the side terminals. A subwoofer audio output allows active subwoofer connection for a strong bass sound and more powerful gaming experience. Five 1080p-compatible terminals (3 HDMI inputs, 2 HD component) ensure images from your game console's 1080p outputs will be as clear as possible. And with the GP3U's incredible 6ms response time, even fast-moving scenes will be crisp and clear. **Requires HDTV Source

item.description: The Panasonic TCP54Z1 has got it all. Its Full HD 1080p resolution, mega high contrast ratio, Game mode, and 600Hz Sub-field drive deliver the best possible images for your games and movies. And your entertainment won't stop there - WirelessHD technology, VIERA Cast, and an SD/SDHC card slot will put everything you love right on the huge 54" display.
item.FS:LongDescription:
The combination of the TCP54Z1's innovative technology and aesthetic design is truly without equal. It makes a bold statement with its elegant style and stunning picture performance thanks to:
  • Full HD 1080p resolution
  • 2,000,000:1 dynamic contrast ratio
  • 600Hz Sub-field drive
  • 4 HDMI inputs and 1 SD/SDHC card slot
And that's not all WirelessHD technology offers a cable-free design. It allows the signal to bounce around the room avoiding people and furniture, while wirelessly transmitting uncompressed Full HD content from your compatible components with no deterioration in sound or picture signal quality. Equipped with THX Certified Display, you'll watch movies with a pristine cinematic quality. Full HD 1080p resolution brings it all to life with astonishingly lifelike images, while the 2,000,000:1 dynamic contrast ratio delivers the brightest whites and darkest blacks, so you see every detail even in shadowy scenes. An SD/SDHC slot and VIERA Image Viewer let you view your photos, while a Game Mode offers faster response with improved shading and detail for better gaming. Plus, you can enjoy the Internet right on your TV. With VIERA Cast technology and a wired broadband connection, you can enjoy online content such as videos, photos, weather and stock information through an easy-to-use Web interface without an external PC.

item.description: This Sony BRAVIA VE5 Eco series LCD HDTV lets you go green without sacrificing your entertainment. item.FS:LongDescription:
Not only will this LCD TV exceed ENERGY STAR 3.0 requirements, but it'll exceed your expectations with the power to reproduce vibrant, razor-sharp images across the 46" display thanks to:

And that's not all The 46" VE5 boasts a high-efficiency HCFL backlight that provides outstanding image quality while exceeding ENERGY STAR 3.0 requirements by over 55% when in Home mode. Plus, an integrated presence sensor detects if you've stepped away from your TV for awhile and shuts the picture off, while the LightSensor automatically adjusts to your room's ambient light and lowers the brightness of the TV's backlight to conserve energy. Equipped with 4 HDMI inputs, you'll be able to connect to a wide variety of HD sources and enjoy the staggering realism of Full HD 1080p resolution. Its Motionflow 120Hz refresh rate technology and high contrast ratio ensure every movement is smooth, while hidden details in darker scenes are brought to life.

item.FS:LongDescription:
Blu-ray technology offers nearly 5 times the resolution of standard definition DVDs, so you see more details, more colours and more of your favourite films. But hang onto your DVD collection - with an HDMI connection, the BD-HP22U can upconvert your old DVDs to near-HD quality so you'll see all those old movies in a whole new light.
  • Provides seamless operability via the AQUOS LINK function through an HDMI connection
  • Quick Start lets you enjoy gorgeous Blu-ray video at the touch of a button in as little as 10 seconds
  • View JPEG digital images as a slide show from recorded CD-RW/Rs
  • Ethernet port
  • Decodes the latest high-definition audio formats

ATT.ATT_VALUE: DD ES; DTS; DTS-HD; DD+; DD TrueHD

item.title: Terk AF992S AM/FM Powered Antenna
item.description: A variable gain control allows you to adjust just how much you need to amplify the signal to get static free reception. Independent AM/FM outputs allow you the flexibility of connecting two separate radios, or if your radio has a separate AM and FM input, it makes for a connection without the trouble of splicing wires.
item.FS:LongDescription:
FEATURES:
  • Built In Hi-Power Amplifier
  • Variable Gain
  • Independent AM/FM Outputs
  • Eliminates Noise

item.title: Monster Home Theatre 2-Outlet Clean Power (MP HT200)
item.description: Get enhanced surge protection Monster Cable's MP Power Distribution HT200. Monster's SurgeGuard circuitry delivers the best possible protection (1110 joules) against performance damaging power surges and spikes. HT200 also prevents power disturbances from traveling down interconnect cable or coax connections to other home theater components in your system.
item.FS:LongDescription:
• In the event of a damaging power surge, Monster's Dual Mode Plus feature disconnects your HT200 from the AC power.
  • The Dual Mode Plus audible alarm beeps to instantly let you know your PowerCenter has sacrificed its life to protect your equipment.
  • Stage 1 Clean Power Filters: Prevents AC power pollution from degrading performance. So, you'll enjoy better sound and picture.
  • $50,000 Connected Equipment Warranty
  • Protects coax lines used for TV and DSS equipment from surge pulses.
  • Visual indicator notifies you of protection status.
  • Audible and visual indicators for damage, protection, and ground status monitoring.
  • Maximum 1100 joule surge protection for both coax lines AC power outlets. Compact, cordless construction plugs directly into wall outlet.
